review_content: I rarely do reviews but I couldn't wait to do this one. My background is this....i hate buying sheets! I haven't found a pair I like that cost under $200. But these sheets are different. They are amazing!  I like how they feel. The microfiber is what made these sheets feel nice. I don't know how long they will last because I have not had them long but so far they are holding up well. The pockets fit nicely on my matress and topper, and they don't wrinkle. As far as I'm concerned, these are worth buying and you can't beat the price.
title: I highly recommend these sheets!

author: PILAR
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2018
review_content: Like most, I pick a seller based off the number of reviews. Being that this company has over 44k almost 5 stars I chose them. I purchased the orange sheets and the color was the same as the photo, when I opened the packaging, and pulled out the sheets to my surprise the fitted sheet was dirty. It looks like it was covered in lent balls but after a closer look it wasn’t lent. I have no idea what it was but it resembled dead skin 😩 the flat sheet was clean and it was missing the pillow cases. It was packaged correctly with the cardboard inside. I’m very dissatisfied and disappointed...I’m going with another company
title: DIRTY AND USED

author: Stephanie Forinash
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2019
review_content: My 5 year old had been coughing through the night for about 2 months. I finally get her in to see an ENT and they diagnose her with allergies. Since it happened at bedtime, my first order of business was to get her something hypoallergenic. These sheets were number one on 3 different consumer reports for best for people with allergies. Even though I read microfiber was like flannel and I worried they would make her too hot, I went ahead and got a set. They are so soft, not at all hot. They are like flannel in texture but not in heaviness. First night they were on her bed, no coughing. We’ve been using them for more then a week and have washed them twice and she still isn’t coughing. I will be getting another set for my husband and I. I took a star away because if you don’t promptly remove them from the dryer and put them on the bed, they get wrinkled. But that’s totally not a deal breaker when my daughter sleeps peacefully through the night again.
title: Super soft, works great for allergy suffers

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2020
review_content: I ordered these sheets because I needed a certain hard-to-find color. After returning a number of other sheet sets that didn't look like the color shown online, I settled on this one. The color isn't exactly what I was looking for, but it goes well with my comforter and I'm happy with it. The sheets are quite soft, as advertised; however, the quality isn't what I hoped for. The sheets are quite thin and flimsy, and it's difficult to get them them to lie smoothly on the bed. I previously had Wamsutta 500 thread-count pima sheets. By comparison, the hems on the top sheet sheets and pillowcases are much narrower, and the pillowcases cases are considerably shorter. Plus, the pillowcases have the decorative edging on only one side so you can't place them with either side up, and they have seams on both sides. I use 4 pillows on the bed and like to put the seamless side to the front, but that isn't possible. Also, my night cream stains them (a problem I never had with my other sheets). I've never had microfiber sheets before and don't know if they are all like this or not, but I'll probably try to avoid them in the future. I would rather spend more money for high-quality sheets.
title: Nice color but, overall, disappointing

author: TTacoma
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2020
review_content: I don't get all the glowing reviews! This is the 3rd or 4th item that I've purchased based upon reviews and the items have NOT lived up to the hype! After 1 washing, the elastic on the fitted sheet is coming apart! Seams coming apart from the sheet, itself. Wrinkle free? NOPE! Not even all that soft! The only good part - the pillowcases, at least they are holding up for the time being. Thanks Amazon for standing behind merchandise and for providing a full refund!
title: More FALSE Advertising!

author: CCF7
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2020
review_content: I ordered these sheets because they had such great reviews and kept seeing them recommended on various articles so I decided to give them a shot. I should have known better than to believe what I read online.The sheets are soft and seem ok right out of the package and the color is as expected. I washed and dried them right after opening according to the directions.When I was making the bed I noticed several spots where threads had been picked leaving runs of several inches or more all over the sheets. They’re still usable but most likely won’t be after a second washing.I would not purchase these again or recommend them to anyone else. I’m giving them 2 stars strictly based on them being soft and true to color.
title: Multiple picks and runs after first wash.

author: Nanny Springer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2020
review_content: Thought I was buying quality sheets. They feel soft as advertised even after washing. You're supposed to wash new sheets before you put them on your bed, right?Ordered king size but these are definitely queen. Packaging said king and since I threw away the packaging, I'm stuck now with sheets that don't fit and can't return them.Buyer beware! Cheap is as cheap does!
title: A King size equals a Queen size?

author: ocean-chick
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2019
review_content: I wish I’d known about these sheets earlier!  They’re a great bargain and they offer split king sets so I don’t have to order 2 twinXL and I king set for our bed.  This is my second purchase because I like to have 2 sets of sheets.  All my other sets went to the thrift store.  You won’t be disappointed!  These are softer than bamboo sheets too...I’ve tried bamboo and they are very soft but the Cozy house sheets are too small!  The fitted sheets pop up on the corners and the flat top sheet only allows about 2” each side and isn’t adequate to tuck in at the bottom tightly.  Many companies don’t offer split king sheets.They don’t pill like some sheets with this material.  I’ve had my first set for a year with no pilling and using all year!iYou have nothing to lose by trying these wonderful sheets because if you don’t like them for some reason (I don’t know what that would be), you can return them.
title: These are the best sheets and a great bargain too!
verified: Size: Split King SetColor: TanVerified Purchase

author: MG
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2020
review_content: I’ve had these for two years now and I don’t even use them consistently, as I alternate between these and some Kate Spade ones that I bought at a discount store several years ago. At first I loved them because they were so soft but after about a year they started ripping and now there are so many rips in them. I can’t speak for stain resistance as I purchased dark gray so I wouldn’t see any. They constantly come off the corners on almost a nightly basis, very frustrating. The only positive note is that they are still soft.I honestly don’t understand why these are so highly reviewed and think the bloggers are just being paid to promote these or are only reviewing based on a couple of uses as they definitely do not hold up.
title: Soft but will tear quickly

author: Momma Max
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2020
review_content: Fitted bottom sheet just doesn't fit!  I ordered a King set and it slips over the corners fine, but the sheet wrinkles and puckers around the corners and creates a lot of wrinkles under our bodies.  Not comfortable at all.  Plus once the top sheet is tucked under the bottom of the mattress, it constantly slips up and I end up with a massive amount of sheet on my face in the morning.  It is because you get what you pay for!  They are very soft and pretty but I bought two sets and cannot use them at all.  Waste of money...giving to Good Will.
title: DOESN'T FIT PROPERLY
verified: Size: KingColor: Striped – Gray / SilverVerified Purchase

author: Jmwhite
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2020
review_content: The sheets were thinner than I expected; however they are very soft and comfortable.  I washed them before putting them on our bed and the sheets had stains from the detergent on them when I took them out of the dryer.  They look like grease stains.  Not sure why that happened.  The think I really didn't like was the fact that I couldn't fit my pillows into the pillowcases.  They are way too narrow.  I like to be able to move my pillow around to fit my neck when I sleep, but had I used these cases I would not have been able to do that.  I tried to get the pillow in the case, but gave up after a few minutes of struggling, knowing that if I did finally get the pillow in the case, it would be too tight to move around.
title: Pillow cases are too narrow.

author: Jessica
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2019
review_content: SUCH great value for the money! The only negative points I could say is that it definitely isn’t ‘wrinkle resistant.’ I have tried every means of making this possible, but it is still MUCH less wrinkle prone than my other quality sheets, and the wrinkles so far don’t seem to stay too long once bed is made. I personally don’t rate sheets based on wrinkle-proneness, but since it was advertised and part of the rating, I thought I’d mention. The only negative thing to me personally is that they are somewhat thin. So, you can see patterns and writing through the sheets a bit, which also makes me think they may not be the best mattress/pillow protector if the fabric is so thin.But, these are seriously some of the softest sheets I’ve ever slept in. SO soft and  comfortable. The luxury feel of these sheets makes up for any of the tiny flaws. PLUS, they are super affordable, there is no denying its worth. I only wish they were bit thicker so I didn’t feel the need to wash them quite as often, since I worry of them not being a super solid barrier between my pillows and mattress.
title: SOOOO Super Soft!!!!

author: Jamie
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2020
review_content: Purchased two sets of these (gray paisley and gray solid). Washed (per directions) and used one time. The fitted sheet has very thin cheap elastic which provide minimal to no structure or support to keeping the sheets in place. Slept on them one night and immediate went out and bought new ones to replace them the next day. I figured with the high amount of reviews and stars on Amazon they would be a good product despite the lower cost as I wasn't looking for the cheapest deal but a good product. Sad they didn't work, they were very pretty sheets. But also very thin and the weird pillow covers only having the one side folded over piece and it wasn't even hemmed in place... very odd.
title: Poorly made fitted sheet

author: Los Marquezos
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2019
review_content: I bought this sheet set based on the reviews and am so loving what a value they are! For years I've been investing in high thread count cotton sheets and was bummed about the cost each time a set wore out or, like our last set, tore. When I came across these I was skeptical that they could be as soft as my 1000 TC Egyptian cotton but they are! Maybe even softer because there's absolutely no break-in time. Right out of the package they are incredibly soft. Plus they don't get staticky and there was no weird smell (my other concerns with microfiber sheets). I adore snuggling in them and look forward to tucking in after a long day. For the price, they are an unbelievable value, and the only sheets I intent to buy from now on!
title: So pleasantly surprised!

author: M Maffet
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2020
review_content: I should have returned them When I opened the package. But I washed them as directed in cool water.  Dried them on low and they were a wrinkled mess.  Not the worst part, they are of the flimsiest material And not well constructed. It is my fault that I did not return them immediately.  I am beating myself up.  For this low price I should have suspected but there were such good ratings.  I did put the bottom sheet on and can sctually see the color of the mattress underneath.  They are going to the Salvation Army.  Save your money, go to Walmart where you can at least feel and see what you are buying.
title: Cheap and thin and wrinkles.

author: Ren
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2018
review_content: These are great sheets. I think the "Brushed" microfiber is what allows these sheets to breathe so you don't get hot. I've tried other microfiber sheets and even in a cold room I got too hot, these are nice and comfortable. I gave it only 4 stars because the burgundy set I bought had a fitted sheet that was way too big. I think it was a king size fitted sheet, the cover sheet was the right size. I also bought this in emerald green and that set was fine so obviously it was just a packaging mistake. Maybe 4 stars is a little harsh for an honest mistake but it's just a heads up to check the sizes when you receive the sheet set. I will definitely continue to buy these.
title: Check the size of all the sheets when you receive the set. Fantastic sheets though.

author: Jerusha Vox
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2020
review_content: I’m super disappointed in these. The color was ugly, like a muddy green gray. They do NOT feel soft at all, they feel like the kind you would get from a general dollar store or something. I Hahahahaha we so excited for my husbands and my first king bed to arrive but our first night was not pleasant because the sheets were so unpleasant. I don’t believer the thread count was high. However it’s too late for me to return them.
title: Not soft
verified: Size: KingColor: Striped – Gray / SilverVerified Purchase

author: AutumnSun
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2020
review_content: Arrived super fast! Packaged nice, neat and secure. And Wow... The texture on these sheets are high quality, smooth and soft. Not too thin and weak like a lot of sheets are. Very nice on the skin, already getting better sleep with these and have had them only 2 days. Zero complaints. I definitely recommend 💯  Thank You! 💞
title: Love! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

author: looking for a good deal
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2020
review_content: I bought the lavender sheets in Kind size. They are a nice quality feeling sheet.  I do not know about stain resistance as I have only had them a few days.  I have wondered about the microfiber material as it always feels so nice.  For me there is one draw back. I like to wear leggings and socks to bed.  The microfiber acts a bit like Velcro.  It adds a lot of drag to clothing and socks.  Other then that the sheets are really nice.  As for wrinkles?  I never did understand this.  You put it on the bed and make the bed or not.  Who cares about wrinkles.  Your going to sleep on it.  You're not wearing it.  I don't see wrinkles myself but why does it matter with sheets?  Does anyone iron their sheets regardless?
title: Looks great, feels nice

author: Malon
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2020
review_content: I've had this set for four years. I tend to rotate with a few other sets of sheets, so depending on your usage habits they might not last as long. There are no holes, stains, or loose threads as far as I can tell and they are still comfortable. It's not really a purchase I regret.However... they attract lint and hair. If you have pets, be prepared to take a lint roller to them fairly often. Even if I brush my cats daily it's a problem. On the white, any hair from pets or humans shows up immediately and it looks... bad. None of my other sheets attract lint like this.They're still good, and cozy, but they're not the best sheets I own and the above issue is annoying.
title: Solid purchase

author: Kris Anderson, The Avid Reader
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2020
review_content: The sheets I normally purchase are no longer available on Amazon, so I started searching for soft sheets with good ratings.  I found  Mellanni burgundy & white checked sheets.  The colors are vibrant and the sheets are soft.  The fit the bed beautifully.  I have a pillow top mattress which the sheets fit with no problem.  They wash up beautifully.  I took them warm from the dryer and put right on my bed.  I need super soft sheets because of a health condition adn Mellanni sheets fit the bill.  I am very satisfied with this set of sheets.  I will be ordering another set.  I would love if they offered more checked patterns.  If you are looking for soft sheets, then look no further.
title: Super soft adorable sheets

author: Kindle Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2017
review_content: Very happy and pleased with this sheet set. They are very soft as stated in the product description, they arrived on time, and were a great price. After receiving the sheets I washed them before placing them on my bed and was very happy that in fact they are wrinkle free. I was also very impressed with the e-mail I received from the company before I received the sheets, letting me know they were just checking in to thank me for the purchase and they would follow up with another e-mail  to find out if I was satisfied. True to their word they did send me a follow up e-mail and the kindness that comes across in their wording, comes across very sincere and genuine as if they will do whatever it takes to make things right. It is for this reason, I am giving them this review and commending them on their excellent customer service skills. Thanks Mellanni!! The one thing I cannot comment on is the durability of the sheets as I have not had them long, but should any problems arise you can bet I will address them with the company.
title: Great customer service, great product, great price

author: heather
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2019
review_content: definitely buy these!even if you just have them as back ups, but I'm certain you will keep this set on your bed. I worked for a bedding distribution center, so I know the pros and cons of thread counts, material, and overall quality and honestly these are my favorites and I will continue to purchase them for all my beds. when you first unpackage them your first impression will be, "dang, these are much thinner then I anticipated." but don't worry, it actually works to benefit the overall feel and comfort.  they are soft and breathe well and come in an endless variety of colors and patterns. I had family visiting from all parts of the U.S. a couple weeks ago and every last one of them ordered while here. to get such an amazing feel for such a low price is unheard of. I washed them before my first use, and have washed and dried them at least 4 times since and they have thus far maintained their great feel without any fading. I'm stocking up before Mellani realizes what a great product they have and start jacking up the prices!!  haha!
title: my friends and family are all buying these now too!

author: Kristin
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2020
review_content: Customer service is amazing! I really wanted to love these sheets. I read through the majority of positive and negative reviews and decided to go for it. I loved the color and pattern, and they are honestly the softest sheets I've ever felt (prior to these we had Jersey and flannel sheets). I used them for 3 nights and they just would not stay on our mattress. We do have a nice, deep mattress, but each time I'd roll over, the sheets would come off one corner. I co-sleep, so I was worried my kids would get caught up in the sheets. So, I emailed customer service and within a day they offered a replacement or full refund. Within two days, my purchase had been refunded and I don't remmee5the last time a transaction with customer service went so smoothly!
title: Great customer service!

author: MakeupartistJen22
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2019
review_content: I purchased these as a back up set of sheets for my sons bed. They were a good price and after reading some reviews, I figured they would be worth the buy. Right out of the box, they were very soft and felt thick enough to be a good quality. With the first washing, they still felt the same softness. They fit the bed perfectly. Its not a deep mattress and they spread tightly against his mattress. If you have a deeper mattress, these might not work for you. Two washings in and the softness is still good. I think these are a great value and quality for the price. Worth the buy!
title: Soft and comfortable for a great price

author: GCDave
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2019
review_content: I've been sleeping on these for about 3 months, and have no complaints whatsoever. I had previously been using sheets purchased locally from stores like Kohls and Target, all of which cost more than these (some were over double the cost of these) and all of those sheets had a problem fitting my (non-pillow top) Original Mattress Co queen size bed. They all failed at the corner seam from stretching them tight to fit the mattress. I read the mixed reviews on these sheets but decided to give them a try...figuring for $30 it was worth a shot.I was pleasantly surprised to find these sheets had very deep corner pockets and fit my mattress wth no problem and no stretching. I've been sleeping on them for over 3 months, so they've been thru the laundry at least a dozen times and so far they are holding up great. They are soft and comfortable. If they don't survive another trip thru the wash, I think I will have gotten my money's worth. I ordered a second set last week for the guest room bed.
title: Very comfortable sheets, and a great value.

author: Jeremy&Jihan
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2019
review_content: These are my 3rd set of these sheets. It’s true what they say about them. Not “crispy” like your standard sheets. But, they are light and airy and I would consider them a good value we’re it not for the fact that the fitted sheets pill so badly. My hair is somewhat coarse and I have noticed that the most concentrated area of the pilling is on the side of the bed where I lay my head. My husband’s side is more consistent with the rest of the bed which has developed pills that are generally uncomfortable, especially when you rub your arms or legs across them. I was never able to pinpoint the longevity with my first 2 sets,  but I realize now on this 3rd set that I only purchased these in April. I change my sheets weekly, they are on a rotation with 4 other sheet sets, and they began to pill in June! Terrible value. I will not be buying these again.
title: Uncomfortable pilling after few uses

author: Happy Puppy
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2020
review_content: We thought the price was too good to be true, but we purchased these sheets anyway ... only blaming ourselves.Upon opening the package, we knew we shouldn't have purchased these, but we gave them a try to be fair. The envelope closures on the pillow cases are poorly constructed and the case seams are puckered up like coffin lining. There were long stitching threads hanging from the product.  The material is very very thin.  The fitted sheet was huge and roughly like putting a boat tarp over a bed; quite funny actually.  After two washings, we decided they had to go.  Already reordered our regular brand; I wish I could mention that name brand here.  I would not recommend these sheets.
title: Expect To Get What You Pay For

author: Consumer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2020
review_content: Have you ever thought....If I pay more it has to be better or what is the best thread count?I know I did. I've purchased sheet sets fromWalmart to boutique 5th Avenue stores andpaid nearly nothing to THOUSANDS! (Yes, they are out there!)Just Google it!I was a little skeptical at first, but the reviews were good and theprice was just right.  I must say that I am impressed with the quality.I mean, I would have expected to pay 10X this just 15 years ago for thisquality and softness.Who knows how long these sheets will be available with this globalpandemic....I would bet these Melanni Bed Sheet Set's might save a few relationships.PS - I am one of those people who delete Amazon emails requesting reviews.  I couldn't help myself.
title: Dirty Little Secrets Needless Markup Doesn't Want You To Know....

author: Holly Caviness
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2020
review_content: These sheets are soft however.. they don’t have the elastic straps to help it stay on the mattress. We have a king size bed and I have to pull the sides down AT LEAST twice a day! I bought a different set from amazon that is MUCH better, same price point and has the elastic bands that go under the corners of the mattress. These sheets would probably work for a smaller sized bed? Maybe idk. Not for me. My least favorite.
title: Not great

author: Justin Waters
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2020
review_content: I was looking for a bed sheet to use in the summertime that would keep us cool during the warmer months.  Apparently night sweats are my new reality as I've now entered my 50s.It appeared that the majority of reviews were positive and multiple people said these sheets kept them cool, so I went for it and placed my order.Long story short, these sheets are super soft, but both my girlfriend & I were hotter under these sheets than the ones we already had.I'll hold onto them because there's nothing wrong with them per se and they are bed sheets.  But as far as keeping you cool, that wasn't our experience with them.
title: The Only Review You Need To Read

author: EclecticMe0208
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2020
review_content: This product category could be very  illusive online unless you buy the product and actually feel it in between your fingers. The packaging was very professional and neat came in a zipper tailored pouch. I use the packaging for storing my makeup sometimes.The material has a sheen to it and pattern draws in the high and the low lights very elegantly. I got a grey queen for my guest room, it works just well with all the neutral decor. It’s soft no doubt but is kind of a thin material maybe close to a satin work shirt if I could compare. I like it so far. Washing with a fabric softener is a good idea always.
title: Elegantly cozy
verified: Size: QueenColor: Striped – Gray / SilverVerified Purchase

author: Kristin Funston
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2020
review_content: I liked these at first, but in less than 6 months they  pilled up badly. They did NOT get softer with time and the quality got worse. They were also a little hot for me. I guess you get what you pay for. Lesson learned.
title: Pilling problems

author: Tbonia
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2020
review_content: This is the first pair of sheets I have ever bought that came flawed. The sheets have 4 good size areas of discoloration in the fabric on both the fitted and flat sheet. So I was very disappointed as they had such good reviews. They do feel soft, not sure about the wrinkle resistance as I won’t be using them because of the very noticeable discoloration. I threw away the package but am sending them back because this is totally unacceptable.
title: Flawed

author: JennyWemmy
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2020
review_content: I didn’t even get to use these! They were already falling apart. Okay, so I am bought these after trying Targets Threshold Performance sheet set. They were the greatest sheets and I loved them, but this COVID-19 got me on a budget so I bought these. Terrible mistake. From the moment you open them and feel the quality, you know these are the cheapest of the cheap sheets. I took them out and BAM! The pillow case is already coming apart. I am livid! I can’t believe these would anywhere near the top of the list. What a shame! I would not recommend to anyone. Heading out to the UPS in a few minutes to return for a refund then off to Target to get the ones I know will last. Such a hassle!
title: Already falling apart out of the box

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2018
review_content: Ive only slept on them 4 nights so far and washed them once before use. Soft but not crisp. Good winter sheets but not cool and crisp for summer weather sleeping.Very good deal, so far, for the price I paid.***EDIT TO ONE STAR***These are now, the worst sheets I’ve ever purchased! They stretch very easily. They stain very easily. If you sweat or have any oils on your skin at all, it will permanently stain the sheets. These are garbage and I’m very disappointed.
title: Great the first few nights. Now terrible!

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2020
review_content: I cannot believe these sheets get so many good reviews. My only thought is that people wrote the reviews right away. Yes they were soft-in the beginning. Only a few months into having them they began to pill. So now my sheets feel like sandpaper. It is not from washing because it’s only where my lower body (leg area) rubs on the sheets. They also continually come off the corner of the bed and have already started to rip on the corner. I am starting to beilieve the Amazon starring system is flawed. These are cheap but you would have to buy them every few months because that is as long as they will be good. Mine as well invest in some that will last longer. Thoroughly disappointed.
title: Thoroughly disappointed.
verified: Size: QueenColor: Striped – Light BlueVerified Purchase

author: Kas
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2019
review_content: Long over due review. I’ve had these sheets for two years and just bought another pair. I bought these as a cheap backup set to a much more expensive set. I would use these when my other set would get dirty and until I washed and put the other ones back on. For some reason I kept thinking the expensive ones would be better for some reason until I started using these as my main sheets. These are the best sheets I’ve ever had and I recommend them to EVERYONE. I’m a forever customer of these sheets.
title: Long time user

author: Leanna G
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2019
review_content: I trusted the overall great score for these sheets but I should have looked closer at the one- and two-star reviews. These sheets are serviceable if you are on an extreme budget or just need a temporary solution. They feel and look like the cheap polyester they are. They did soften up slightly after a wash, but they are still pretty slippery. The top sheet is the worst offender and feels, as someone else put it, like a cheap Halloween costume. I also find the set to be very warm, which could be a good thing, but as I'm headed into a southern summer it's not a good match. If you can spend an extra $20, hit up HomeGoods or Pottery Barn's sale section. You'll be much happier.
title: You get what you pay for
verified: Size: QueenColor: Quatrefoil Navy BlueVerified Purchase

author: Wonder Diva
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2019
review_content: I am in love with these sheets. They have deep pockets and they actually stay on the bed!Here’s the thing our bed is an adjustable bed. When we move the bed we tend to lose the bottom sheet. But not with these! They stay put!Also my husband tends to “jump” into bed. He also has a tendency to levitate off the bed, do a triple lindy then fallback onto the bed. Every day for years I have had to pull the fitted sheet back up to keep it on the bed. But not with these sheets! These sheets are magical and completely husband proof!They are super soft and very comfortable to sleep on. We will be ordering more of these in gorgeous colors.Oh, and even the husband made a comment that he loved these sheets! Winning!
title: These sheets are magical! Husband approved.

author: amjb0815
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2020
review_content: After exhausting searches looking for a great set of sheets, I turned to Google. These were listed as the 2nd best sheets of the year! Of course, I would have purchased the BEST sheets but with a price point of $120, I thought that is something to aspire to but does not fit my budget just yet! But I love these sheets and was more excited about the price and how much I saved!! You can't beat the value. They are soft and so cozy! I'm going to purchase another set for the guest room very soon!
title: 2nd Best Sheets of 2020
verified: Size: California KingColor: Striped – Gray / SilverVerified Purchase

author: lindelewis
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2017
review_content: This sheet set was purchased specifically for a guest airbed in hopes that the sheets would be very comfortable and non-slip. I haven't yet tried the sheet set out as our expected guest will, unfortunately, not be coming when first expected. However, the sheets feel so beautifully soft that I'm sure they will be very comfortable. The colour is perfect. The company seems very concerned about customer satisfaction and helpfully kept in contact during the ordering and shipping process.
title: The softest sheets ever.

author: Kate S
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2020
review_content: These may be some of the softest sheets I’ve ever felt. Not to be a brat, but I own Brooklinen and Boll & Branch sheets for comparison, and while they reign supreme, these Mellani sheets win in the softness category. Where Mellani falls short is breathability- holy moly, these sheets are HOT. I do not consider myself to be a warm sleeper, but only 10 minutes under these and I’m searching for the cool spots. This is probably due to the fact that they are 100% polyester. They are also very thin which quite frankly doesn’t bother me too much, but I don’t like being able to make out the pattern of the mattress when I look at the fitted sheet lol. Unless you don’t mind being warm at night, I wouldn’t recommend.
title: HOT HOT HOT!

author: Monica overton
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2020
review_content: These sheets are wonderful, they are so soft. I laundered the sheets before I put them on my bed and left them in the dryer over night, the sheets had a few wrinkles from sitting in the dryer balled up all night, but they were quick to disappear after I put them on the bed. There wasn't one wrinkle left. The pockets are so deep that they actually stretch over my huge mattress and the 4 inch topper I have on top. All my other sheets kept popping off during the night because of the thick topper. Not these sheets, they stayed on all night. I'm ordering more and retiring all my other sets. They have now been replaced.
title: very soft and really deep pockets

author: KC
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2020
review_content: These were great at first, but ended up with a huge discoloration where my husband sleeps after multiple washes (which has never happened with any other set). Additionally, I’ve never seen sheets pull hair and fibers the way these did. It wasn’t noticeable at first, but upon pulling the sheets back after a nights sleep, there was crap everywhere which I again have never seen in all my years of sleeping! Overall I ended up being grossed out by these sheets and throwing them away after only a few months of having them.
title: Disappointed after raving reviews

author: Tashnuva
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2018
review_content: I was very very very skeptical ordering these cause me and my husband can only handle 100% cotton bed sheets and fabrics and we all know how expensivethose can get. But for the price and the reviews,  I thought I'd give these a try & good thing I did. The first night I asked my husband if the sheets were ok without letting him know these were microfiber cause I wanted an unbiased opinion. His response was "they are just like the usual ones we use"! Yup! They are, for less than half the price!And I washed these for the first time today, didn't even need them to put in the dryer,  they were already so dry from the spin that I just laid them under the fan for few minutes and done :DI sure will be ordering more.On the durability I'll update if it doesn't last.
title: Super impressed

author: Anne
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2020
review_content: I hate to leave bad reviews, but I wouldn't recommend these sheets.  From the pictures, I thought they appeared to have decent quality.  However, these sheets are microfiber which cause them to pill a lot.  At first they seemed very soft, but after using them for a few weeks now, I would not have purchased them.  They are almost more fleece-like in that they are so soft, they keep you very warm (we're hot sleepers so that was not good for us).  They pill quite a lot and are very thin.
title: Poor Quality, Lots of Pilling, Not for Hot Sleepers

author: Michael Davide
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2016
review_content: I bought these based on the high reviews.  Basically, you get what you pay for.  They are poor quality sheets.  after opening them I washed them in cool water and the lowest dryer setting.  I took them out of the dryer and the stitching at the top of the flat sheet had come undone and the stitching for both pillowcases came undone.  Total poor quality but you get what you pay for.  I'll go back to expensive quality sheets next time.  Save your money and aggravation
title: They are poor quality sheets

author: Expo67
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2020
review_content: We ordered the white sheet set. On arrival we washed them before using.Yes, they are not as thick as percale sheets.. but you are not buying percale. They were soft and light, and the size of the flat sheet and the pillowcases were generous., unlike some other pricier sets we have bought in the past.After sleeping on them, we are very happy with them. They were so soft on the skin, and so comfortable to sleep in.I did not rate the stain resistance, only because as of now, we have had no experience with stains.We like the sheets so much, that today we ordered two more sets, plus an extra set of pillowcases.
title: Generously sized.

author: Kenneth T.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2020
review_content: Microfiber has a price advantage, but cheap versions of it will pile and form those balls, making the fabric feel like sandpaper. Since I'm not made of wood, no thanks.How have these held up in 3 years of use?The elastic and stitching have not worn or ripped anywhere, the sheets and pillowcases still have smooth surfaces. No piling.  I have other microfiber sheets 6 months old that are already useless due to the pile build up.I don't do anything special in the laundry, no air drying or ironing....get real. They go in the washer with fabric softener, they go in the dryer.So, they do last. Durability is a big deal when sheets and blankets are concerned, after 3 years these have shown to be on the higher quality side.The only complaint is hardly worth mentioning, was thinking they had a glossy finish, the color name is silver after all, but in reality grey is grey.One note to add, have a Blue Heeler mix dog that has shredded at least 5 fitted sheets during the last 2 years, these have managed to avoid that fate. The dog has also been evicted from the bedroom during the day, and has filed a formal complaint.
title: 3 Years Using These Sheets, Honest Review
verified: Size: KingColor: Striped – Gray / SilverVerified Purchase

author: M and R
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2019
review_content: Based on all the hype and these being on lightening deal, I purchased the grey paisley. First of all, they're tan and not grey (see pics). I was expecting GREY, but that's not what I got. Also, the underside of the topsheet doesn't have the pattern so unless your sheets are perfectly pulled and not turned over at all, you're going to see white (again, see pic). I was pretty disappointed in this because it makes them look super cheap. They're pretty thin and sort of loud to sleep on, but they're not scratchy or anything. The pillow cases also have a weird fold at the top so instead of the seam being finished all the way around there's a little open piece (yet again, see pic). I'm sure this is supposed to be there since both pillow cases have it, but it's pretty stupid and not very useful.
title: Not sure what all the hype is about

author: PLJM
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2020
review_content: I bought these sheets in July 2020......the fitted bottom sheet ripped in Oct......I contacted the seller as suggested on their website and was optimistic after getting an email reply within an hour or two.It stated that " their team was looking into " my problem and would get to me quickly....I have yet to hear from them and doubt I ever will.....the pros..... the sheets are very nice and soft and I really like that the top sheet is longer than other sets I've purchased. I like that the fitted sheet had elastic all around it.the cons..... the elastic on the fitted sheet was not very strong and really stretched out with just a few washings.It also tore after three months of use despite the sheets being washed in cold water and dried on low.I can't recommend these sheets or the manufacturer and wouldn't buy again.IF I EVER hear from the seller I will update this reviewUPDATE...............................I heard back from the seller and Ashley took care of my situation quickly and sent a replacement set.I really appreciate her attention to this matter and standing behind this product.Many thanks Ashley!!
title: lasted only 3 months
verified: Size: QueenColor: Pin Stripe GrayVerified Purchase

author: Shann 🎀 Shann
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2019
review_content: If the feel of your sheets is an important deciding factor for you, you are sure to love these microfiber sheets as much as I do. These sheets are perfect for those who love a soft silky feel. If you move around a lot at night, these sheets slip and slid without becoming a tangled mess at night. A generous cut fits my ridiculously deep mattresses, and the elastic quality keeps them in place. These sheets feel so soft against the skin & I look forward to sliding in them at night. These have a thin light feeling yet facilitate good airflow. These launder well without wrinkles or fading. Great quality and price point. I love this new color I have purchased...a deep saturated gunmetal Gray. This is my second set. Highly recommend & happy once again with my purchase. 🤗6/2020 …This Dark grey set is now my third set of sheets
title: If the feel of your sheets is important to you...then you will love these!

author: Mrs. B
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2019
review_content: I just opened these sheets and they were very wrinkle. I put them in the dryer with a damp towel to help remove some but not all of the deep wrinkles. I ended up ironing the pillow cases to make them look more presentable in our guest room. I also had trouble stretching the fitted sheet over the mattress. The elastic is loosely encased and slides around the sheet making it difficult to keep on one corner at a time. It was hard to tell who ch corner was the short or long end too. Then I struggled multiple times to pull it over another corner. I got so frustrated I had to ask my husband to help me put on the fitted sheetIf you want a "thin" flimsy sheet set this is for you. I have had no experience with stains...yet. For the cheap price and I was in a hurry to find some full size sheets I would not recommend these again.
title: Much thinner fabric and definately not wrinkle free

author: Jena
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2019
review_content: Oh. My. Goodness. These sheets are like butter. Another review said they were thin and I was a bit worried, but they are awesome. I legit didn’t wear pants to bed tonight specifically so I can lay here and rub my legs on the sheets - they’re that soft!The color was exactly as expected, as well, and they are pretty wrinkle-free...and I left them in the dryer for like 7 hours before putting them on the bed.I paired them with the Eikei Washed Cotton Chambray Duvet Cover and Linenspa all season down alternative quilted comforter, which, for the record, are just as amazing as these sheets. Pro tip on the duvet: size up! I got a king for our queen sized bed and it was a life changing experience.Overall, would highly recommend and will definitely be buying again!
title: Buttery soft!

author: Dana
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2020
review_content: I have been an Amazon prime member for years. I’ve spent thousands on products and have NEVER left a review, positive or negative. After this purchase I feel I need to.I was looking for sheets that were nearly as soft as satin, yet not slippery. I also wanted something that helped me stay cool on warm summer nights.I have tried VERY expensive high thread count sheets of varying brands and styles....THESE ARE THE BEST I have ever had!!!! I’ve had them for over a week and washed prior to first use. I hope they hold up as they are very thin, but the softness is incredible!!! More importantly, I stay cool at night and find myself still covered upon awakening (I usually kick everything off at night).  I’ve already purchased two more sets!!!
title: AMAZING!!!

author: Amanda 💚
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2019
review_content: First of all, I ordered the burgundy split king set and everyone in my house says they're red. Definitely not burgundy. The color bled so bad in the washer. I washed them in cold water as soon as I got them. I washed them alone. I washed them last week with the  mattress protectors I have for our beds and those are now pink. The elastic that's supposed to wrap all around the mattress definitely doesn't fit or stay very well at all. My husband asked that I go back to Target and buy two twin XL sets of the last sheets we had for our queen bed. They have double elastic around the corners and never slipped off the mattress.  I will not buy this sheet set again. They're soft but that's the only good thing I can say about them.
title: Would not recommend
verified: Size: Split King SetColor: BurgundyVerified Purchase

author: Allie
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2017
review_content: Update: I washed for the 2nd time and there is already a pucker line at the top of the top sheet running across the whole thing. I'm deciding whether or not to return and get another set or to return and get a refund. I'm worried it'll just do the same thing in the next set I get.The sheets are extremely soft. I just got them and decided to put them in the wash. They are pretty thin, so I don't know how long lasting they will be, but it says it comes with a lifetime warranty if you register them, so that's what I'm going to do. The reason I gave them 4 stars instead of five is because I ordered burgundy, and what I got was more of a burnt red color. It's not the deep dark hue as described, which is the color I wanted. Because they are good sheets, I'm going to keep them, but for anyone wanting this color, know you're not going to get it.
title: They are pretty thin, so I don't know how long lasting ...

author: Kelli J Ochs
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2020
review_content: I was suckered into purchasing these by a Today Show Facebook post about how thousands of buyers just loved these cheap sheets. Yeah, it’s a NO from me, dawg. They came out of the package with some oily marks on them so they either weren’t new/had been returned, or were in contact with body oils of someone in the manufacturing/packing process. I took them directly to the washer and the marks did not wash out. So I’m assuming any of my own body oils would transfer to the sheets as well. Not pretty. They were also a ball of static when they came out of the dryer. They did feel soft and they are sheets, so I guess for some people that’s enough. But I found them to be poor quality & didn’t even want them on my bed. There’s no cheap substitute for good quality sheets. Pay good money for good cotton sheets, they last a very long time & are worth every penny of the investment. A good night’s sleep is too precious to waste on these icky sheets.
title: Don’t buy into the FB hype
verified: Size: KingColor: Striped – Gray / SilverVerified Purchase

author: Kristin Plumier
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2019
review_content: These are great sheets! About 3-4 years ago, I ordered two pairs of these sheets and they quickly became our favorites. They are comfy and are easy to put on the bed, and stay on great.  If you like your sheets to be super tight, I don't recommend these, as they are very big and do not go on perfectly taut.  But I don't mind that, because I find them easy to put on the bed and there's enough sheet that the corners don't come undone during the night..  We rotated our 2 sets for the 3-4 years, and one set got a little worn, so I bought two more for the rotation. But great quality for such a good price.
title: Economical, comfortable, good quality sheets

author: Tracy
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2018
review_content: I was hesitant to purchase these sheets even though they have such a high star rating.  I thought mabye the great ratings were due to such low cost for decent sheets.  Trust me when I say these sheets are the best set of sheets I’ve ever purchased.  I’ve paid well over $100+ in the past for so called soft high quality sheets and have never found any that compare to these!  Th softness is amazing and I can’t even explain to you how comfy they are.  You must try a set for yourself.  After the first night I slept on these I purchased more the next day.  You will not be disappointed with a set of these.  Only thing that happens when you wash them is they get even more comfy.  Best sheet purchase I’ve ever made!Update 10-9-2020.  These sheets are amazing!  Seems like they just get more comfy with every wash.  These are the only sheets I buy now for all my beds.
title: Most Comfortable Sheets I’ve ever slept on!

author: Tiffany
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2019
review_content: It does have that slight microfiber feel but not as "bad" as many other microfiber sets. Aside from spending double/triple the price for Egyptian Cotton (or incredibly high thread counts) this set is the best I've found for temperature regulation (staying cool or warm) and softness. I've bought two sets now, the older being ~5 months old (with constant use, we clean them and put them right back on the bed) shows little/if any wear AND just as soft as the day we got them. Being that Ive bought darker colors I cannot speak to the "stain resistant" nature of the sheets. The Dark Grey set I bought has had little bleeding of color as far as wash goes, the Imperial Blue on the other hand has had a lot so far BUT only in the wash (which honestly is expected of most vibrant colors.) The newest set did come with a small snag but nothing worth sending the sheets back and dealing with the refund exchange process (or the potential process, I've no idea how well this company's customer service works.)
title: Softest you're gonna find for under $40

author: Bess Basonic
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 29, 2016
review_content: Not exactly what I was expecting. I'm not even sure that you can actually compare these to standard thread count sheets, simply because the two fibers feel completely diiferent. If your basing it off of the simple fact of how many strands are in a square inch then the numbers work, but that's about it..... They feel like a flannel sheet. I've been so hot the last few nights. Generally when people get high thread counts, theyre looking for that super slick silky feel. This is not really what's going on here. They are very soft! Just not the same as 1500 thread count cotton. These sheets are are so stretchy too. So if you're rolling about in the sheets, then you can easily get wrinkles under yourself. I think this is where they differ from regular high thread count sheets.  I was hoping that the "elastic that goes all the way around" would keep them super tight on the mattress, but with the stretchy-Ness of the sheet, its irrelevent. Don't get me wrong....they are very soft,  but if your looking for soft, go get some flannel sheets, or get these!!
title: They're Ok? Kinda feel like flannel. Too hot

author: Nicole M.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2020
review_content: Well in opening the package and before its first wash I noticed right away that the stitching looked inferior and almost as if the manufacturer rushed it through the sewing process as fast as possible.  Almost looked as if it was merely basted. Very surprised as I had read mostly good reviews. There were several loose threads and on the flat sheet there was a lot of thread gathering on the hems. Very soft, yes... but I already realized through all my years of buying Linens that I will have to be very careful and treat these sheets extra gently both in the wash and dryer. Also, I ordered full size and that was also what was on the label when they arrived but they are definitely a very generous queen size. I'm expecting the bed sheet to loosen up quite a bit after sleeping. And that can be a little annoying. A bit disappointed in the quality.
title: Not what I was expecting. In fit and quality.

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2019
review_content: Read on a beauty blog that these are the best and they really are.  My husband is a beast and destroys sheets. So expensive sheets are out. He has ruined hundreds of dollars in luxury sheets. I like the nice hotel sheets and it’s pointless.  These come pretty dang close. I was  skeptical because I want  Egyptian Cotton... well I’m sold.  I’ll be buying again.  They last longer and they felt pretty close to the expensive ones.
title: Yes!! My husband is a sheet destroyer. I love these!!!

author: Shannon Powell
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2020
review_content: Consider myself very picky when it come to bed sheets. I also have an issue finding the right ones for a great fit. We have a sleep number and over the years it's been hard to find sheets that fit. I went out on a limb and after looking at a ton of sheets decided to order these. Price  was good and they looked nice. OMG these sheets are amazing! I love that the elastic is all around the fitted sheet, probably really helps in keeping it on the bed, and it keeps it on the bed! Not one corner off! Super soft and makes it hard to get out of in the morning! I'm a fan and will continue to purchase these sheets in the future!
title: Hands down the best sheets!
verified: Size: KingColor: Striped – Gray / SilverVerified Purchase

author: Garden Mama
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2019
review_content: I realize that colors can vary from screen to life, but these "Gold" sheets are more yellow, like a manila envelope. The cases and fitted sheet are WAY too big! I ordered King, I've had a king size bed for over 20 years now so have been buying sheets for one for as long, but the cases and fitted sheet are way bigger than any other set I've purchased in the past (Even after washing and drying before putting them on the bed). The material seems like it will last a while, and they are soft and pretty warm for their weight: but when I was removing the sheets from their packaging one of the threads in the seam/hem around the outside of the flat sheet got caught on the zipper and pulled. No big deal because there is another set of stitches, but I wonder what will happen next time I wash them.If they weren't so inexpensive and I didn't need them right away, I probably wouldv'e returned them.
title: Color not as seen in pic, sheets are BIG!

author: Carolyn Van Valien
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2020
review_content: I ordered these sheets based on the excellent reviews for the price and wow!  I am super impressed that they are very soft, luxurious, and not too heavy.  I'm in menopause and always super hot.  These were great!  Simple with nice stitching and small detail.  I am not sure how they will wash up or if they are stain and pill resistant, since they are new, but I really love them and actually used the top sheet to cover me for the first time in years.  I have purchased more expensive sheets with a higher thread count and they sucked and pilled.  I'm hoping these will be be better.  So far, so good.
title: Best sheets ever!
verified: Size: EXTRA DEEP pocket - QueenColor: WhiteVerified Purchase

author: Camps
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2020
review_content: I wanted to replace my summer sheets. I was looking for something that would keep me cool at night. The are soft and comfortable. I have a feeling it won’t take long for them to pill, but I will have to give a later update on that, since I’ve only have them two weeks. I also ordered them because they fit deep mattresses. They fit well. It’s not easy to find deep pocket sheets that fit my bed. With my topper, I need an 18” deep fitted sheet. These (although not perfect) fit well. So that’s a plus. I don’t have to worry about waking up and being strangled by a wayward sheet, that’s always annoying. I love the color. I ordered an extra set of pillow cases. The cases have a flap so you can tuck them in around the pillow which is also nice. I will update this review after more washes and let you know how they held up. But as of right now, for the price, they are decent.
title: Cool and comfortable

author: bigdjunta
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2018
review_content: I was very impressed with the softness and thickness of these sheets at this price point.The color I purchased, red, also had a nice, deep saturation of color. I had to return the first set of sheets purchased as there was some stray stitching in the center of the flat sheet. This was handled in a very efficient and friendly manner and in no way changes my feelings about this excellent purchase. I would buy again.These sheets have also been washed multiple times with no pilling.The reason for 4 stars is a tendency for the sheet to come off the corners when I elevate the head of my bed-the head and feet raise and lower like a hospital bed and sometimes the corners "pop" off. If you need VERY deep pockets, this might be an issue for you. Just keep that in mind.
title: VERY SOFT sheets
verified: Size: Split King SetColor: BurgundyVerified Purchase

author: MomofFour
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2019
review_content: I am a self processing sheet snob. If it wasn’t at least 600 thread count Egyptian cotton, I was not interested. But being at the age where I get hot flashes and night sweats, and have teenage children that use Proactiv, I read the many reviews and thought, “Why not? These are inexpensive and are peroxide resistant.” Oh my word. I’m telling you I have not slept so well in my 51 years than I have on these super soft, comfortable sheets. I ended up ordering them for all of our beds. Guests comment on how nice they are and how they keep them comfy, yet cool (no more night sweats with these!) Seriously, you need to try them because they are truly THAT GOOD! I LOVE these sheets!
title: Best sheets I’ve ever owned! Ever.

author: Alli
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2019
review_content: I’m not impressed with these sheets. I ordered a queen set in persimmon for my Tempur-Pedic mattress. In the photo, the color is sort of a muted orange (well, like the exterior of a persimmon), sort of an autumn fall color. What we got was more of a papaya flesh color, closer to orange sherbet. It’s VERY bright. More of a summer orange. Big difference, since I was already on the fence about ordering a shade of orange. Not as soft as other microfiber sheets I’ve slept on, which were another brand’s hotel collection, but I’m hoping they soften up with more washings (have washed them twice at this point). The sheets fit fine on our deep pocket mattress so we will keep these as a backup set, but overall they aren’t what I expected.
title: Not quite persimmon, not quite soft.

author: JillHdz
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2019
review_content: The sheets have a high-quality look and the pockets are deep enough to fully fit our Tempur-Pedic matress.  I ordered Spa Blue to match the color scheme in our bedroom, I was hoping for sheets in the same color as the ones in the photo but unfortunately, the sheets I received were more of a grayish blue color. I wash my hair every day and my face twice a day (in the morning and at night before bed), when I woke up this morning, there was a huge stain in the middle of the pillowcase where I laid my head. I don't have oily skin or hair and I don't sweat, so I am not sure what caused this stain? Well, it's been 2 hours and the stain is still there, it hasn't faded. I will not sleep on sheets that stain this easily, I will be returning for a refund.
title: Definately NOT Stain-Resistant!

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2019
review_content: These are the best linens I have ever purchased! Purchased sheets from high end retailers for quadruple the cost of these sheets but Mellanni ones are better quality, fade resistant, and truly wrinkle free. Plus so extremely soft! Loved these so much have purchased another set for myself and one set for a gift. Extremely satisfied with the quality and priced very reasonable. Mellanni will be on my shopping list for gifts this Christmas. Everyone needs a quality, pretty linen set.
title: Awesome Quality Linen Set Extremely Soft

author: Gbnola
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2020
review_content: These sheets are OK for the price, so I won't bother returning them.  I bought white so no issues with color. As other reviewers stated, the decorative pillow case trim is only on one side and the other side has an inside seam that isn't sewn down.  Curious to see how this will hold up after multiple washes.  I could barely tuck in the sides of the top sheet on my king deep pocket mattress.  On the plus side, the sheets are very soft and came out of the dryer with very few wrinkles.  And the size was ample at the top and bottom.  I would not purchase again.
title: Soft, short top sheet, unsewn seam on pillow cases

author: Mom83
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2019
review_content: Just ok. Not really seeing anything special about these, just microfiber sheets. I got the light grey. They are mostly not see through- I have a pattern on my mattress protector and if I look close in the light I can see it a bit, but not like super cheap sheets. A darker color would probably be better, but I use Proactiv which can bleach colors. I think I I would've liked the dark grey better but I was worried about the bleaching. Thought about ordering white instead but I think those would've definitely been see-through. Not really crazy about this light grey color. Also, I am used to sleeping with flannel sheets and 2 comforters year round, but I've been extremely warm with just the sheets and a light blanket. I guess that means less laundry though. With as thin as these are I feel like I will have to wash the mattress protector more often which is a pain. I might switch back to flannel.
title: Just ok

author: Clueless
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2020
review_content: These sheets are very soft! But the description is very misleading! Just because '1800' is used in the description, does Not mean 1800 thread count. After they were delivered, I took them in to wash them. When I held the Pillow cases (note - pillow cases, which means two pieces of sheet material overlapping) I could see light through them. Holding up one sheet you could see even more!  While the sheets are soft to the touch, I really do not expect them to last more than a year with one adult using them and changing/washing them on a weekly basis. And I don't mean using the same set over and over. I mean taking them off the bed after a week and washing them.
title: Not what they seem
verified: Size: QueenColor: Striped – Gray / SilverVerified Purchase

author: Krazie-K
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2020
review_content: After seeing several influencers rave about these sheets, I decided to go ahead and purchase a set. I have a very deep queen mattress, so I ordered a California King to ensure that it would fit. Once opened, there was a dusty-looking stain (see picture) but, I went on to wash it in hopes it would come out - it didn’t. The softness of the sheets was nothing impressive; but my last set was also microfiber so maybe that’s why I had this impression.By this time, I’ve washed the sheets twice and slept on them for a week. I just can’t figure out what all the hype is about! Don’t get me wrong, these sheets aren’t terrible - the price was reasonable and the quality is good (minus the stain) but I would most likely purchase another brand before buying this brand again.
title: Not worth the hype...

author: Mirtha R
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2019
review_content: Este juego de sabana tiene muy buena calidad es muy suave justo lo que buscaba y no es calurosa la tela.Alguien en una tienda me dijo que el tamannnnnno Queen es el mismo que Full.No es cierto ,es mas grande.Quiero comprar otro juego de sabana igual pero esta ves Full size porque mi cama es Full.La recomiendo muchisimo tiene muy buena calidad.Y ese precio esta muy economico comparado con las tiendas que los precios son exageramente caros aludiendo algodon egipcio etc.Muchas gracias al fabricante y a las personas que lo han recomendado,eso me animo a comprarla.
title: Quede muy satisfecha.La recomiendo.

author: Rita's Mommy
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2018
review_content: I got these sheets originally because my brother deemed them "the best sheets in the world." My husband and I enjoyed them for awhile, and then his mother got us some very high thread count cotton sheets as a gift. By comparison, these microfiber sheets are lighter and smoother (almost like satin), but they don't feel as high quality as the others. They also won't keep you as warm at night. These are great summer sheets, and great sheets for a guest bed that isn't used nightly. Love the variety of colors - very easy to coordinate bedspread colors with your sheets!
title: Feels almost like satin, if you're into that.

author: Andrew
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2020
review_content: I own two sets of these and rotate between the two, one is grey and one is green. The green was our first one and it was a gift, if I had my way they’d both be grey just for aesthetic reasons. I’m going to be blunt with you: my sheets get a beating. Coffee, breast milk, spit up, toddler milk, baby pee, baby poo, peanut butter all the other wonderful bodily liquids you can imagine: they all get on my sheets! I’m a gross person with gross children. Somehow: these sheets always wash out wonderfully! We have no lingering stains after 2 years of continuous use. We wash our sheets AT LEAST twice a week right now, due to my breastfeeding three month olds various contributions. No pilling, no visible wear, no stretching. I will admit: to me the most important thing is softness. How do the sheets feel when I climb into bed after they’ve been freshly washed? These sheets are the absolute best for that feeling! They clean up soooooo nice, over and over again.
title: Durable, Practical, Cost-Effective

author: FlowersInSpring
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2016
review_content: Really cool sheets. Have not had issues with fraying or any damage to the product after multiple washes. I got the navy/dark blue color and it was really vibrant. Have not had issues with it running dark blue dye in the washer either after the initial wash. Comfortable.Update: I bought and reviewed these sheets in 2016, it is now Feb 2020. I bought the dark blue/navy queen size set. The color has stayed vibrant, no issues there. The top sheet and pillow cases have remained in great condition after many uses and washes.My initial rating of the product was a 5/5. I am changing that to a 4/5 stars, because the fitted sheet fairly quickly tore in the middle of the sheet (in ~2017 or 2018, so only a year or two of use). I have sheets that are over 30 years old from my parents that have not torn or frayed at all, and I like to think I take care of my belongings and wash everything with care. One day though, when I was getting out of bed, a small rip formed in the middle of the sheet and quickly grew to be a huge hole. I sewed it back together, but it isn't as comfortable to lay on and I am constantly worried any movement will make it rip apart again. I have since bought more expensive sheets, and occasionally use the fitted sheet if I forget to do laundry. I still use the pillowcases regularly though.Let's be real, these are pretty cheap sheets, so you get what you pay for, but overall it was a bit disappointing. 4/5.
title: Great sheets. Update: fitted sheet tore

author: Sheena Hansen
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2019
review_content: I bought 1 set of these sheets in King size Hydrangea blue.  Nice fitting, soft and pretty color; washes well. The thing that really impressed me was the “ no staining” part.  A week after I got these sheets we ended up rescuing an abandoned baby Robin bird who was  too young to fly. He ended up learning to fly and flew into the bedroom several times prior to being released and pooped on the nice new sheets several times . Horrible purple poo due to eating blackberries and blueberries and I was so worried about my new sheets being stained. They washed out so easily with no stains and the sheets don’t wrinkle; barely a crease. The one observation I have is that it can get a little warm on a hot summers night, but in general they do not cause sweatiness or discomfort.  I am so pleased with them I ordered a second set; a very pretty lilac set
title: These lovely sheets do not stain or wrinkle!

author: Carlie
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2019
review_content: I recently purchased a new mattress and wanted some nice new sheets to go with it. I was ready and willing to "splurge" on some really nice ones, but realized I couldn't justify spending that much on a single set of sheets. I'd heard about these before, and then came across them again and I'm so glad I did. For the price, my expectations weren't really high, just in case they didn't turn out to be as good as everyone said. Before these, I had sheets I'd bought from a fundraiser that boasted a high thread count, but they pilled terribly, which wasn't a huge deal, but also wasn't preferable. I was so excited when these sheets came out of the dryer as smooth and soft as they were straight out of the package. I've had them almost a month, and they're really great. I'll be getting several more sets of these so I can throw out all of my old sheet sets.
title: Buy these sheets!

author: Natascha VonBargen
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2020
review_content: If this product was the color it shows in the picture, I would be fine with it. I ordered the Grey/Silver, to go with my other grey/silver bedding and decor. The grey color of this looks like it has maybe a green undertone? I don't know how to explain it, but it does not look like the color pictured.I would honestly return it, but don't want to go through the trouble.Aside from the color, the quality is fine. The sheets are soft. I've noticed a lot of wrinkles despite being advertised as wrinkle free. Even fresh out of the dryer.I gave 4 stars for softness.1 star for wrinkle-free since it was wrinkled coming fresh out of the dryer.1 star for stain resistant because the product I received already seemed to have some discoloration.
title: Grey/Silver Color not as pictured
verified: Size: KingColor: Striped – Gray / SilverVerified Purchase

author: Lindsey Martinez
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2020
review_content: I’m really not that much of a sheets snob, but these aren’t that great to sleep on.First, the white sheets look nice. They don’t wrinkle THAT much, and really, if they did, I don’t mind (hubby is on 3rd shift, I’m on first, bed RARELY gets made). Second, the sheets I purchased came well-made in and all the same color. Third, they’re really soft and not scratchy. When I do make my bed, they fold nicely under my king mattress.My number one gripe is that the sheets stick to my clothing in bed. Every time I roll over, the sheets glue to my pajamas and as I roll, they do, too, causing me to turn into a burrito. It’s annoying and uncomfortable. I only use these sheets if my other set is in the wash and I can’t wait to make the bed (like when you get a burst of energy right before bed to do all the laundry you haven’t done).In all, I would not buy them again because of comfortability, not because of looks or feel. If you’re into being rolled really tightly into your bedding even without trying, these are for you. If you’re not into that kind of thing, well, I’m your cautionary tale.
title: When I Roll, They Roll.

author: Devon Shatto
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2020
review_content: Wow these sheets are great. I am so glad I listened to the reviews and went for them instead of spending an arm and a leg for the "real deal". They are extremely soft and comfortable on the skin. My son spilled a drink on the second day and only a little bit got on the sheets, but I immediately took them off and threw them in the laundry and it did come right out no problem! They are not extremely cold, but they definitely have a cooling feel at first and they seem to pull heat away from you throughout the night, they definitely do NOT get hot! They also have zero wrinkles or creases, which is a huge pet peeve of mine, I usually have to readjust my sheets every day, but now I don't! If you have a thinner mattress like I do, probably around 12 inches thick, do not be afraid of the deep pocket, they fit absolutely perfect even though they can handle a very thick mattress. 10\10 product for sure. Shipping was very quick and customer service was great. Definitely will be ordering more in other colors soon!
title: Extremely soft and not a single wrinkle!

author: Amanda Leventhal
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2020
review_content: The sheets with the design on them are totally different from the solid colored sheets I got. They feel completely different. They shouldn't act like they're the same sheets with the only difference being the appearance. I loved the way the solid colored sheets felt, so I went to order more, and I just wanted them to have the same feel, just look different. The sheets with the design are thinner and feel more slick than the solid colored ones (I got the...slate-colored ones, I guess you'd call it). They're still okay, just not as good as the solid colored ones.
title: Solid Color Sheets Feel Better Than the Design-Sheets
verified: Size: QueenColor: Quatrefoil Silver - GrayVerified Purchase

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2017
review_content: first time buyer, and the price is what caught my attention. Received package on time. I order the yellow and a maroon color.  And  did a test fit. It fit perfect with no problem getting them over the corners. We have a bed/mattress that raises  up and down and  we saw no problems of sheet popping off corners or on the sides. The are very soft to touch. As compared to my other sheets that we usually buy and at three times the cost of theses. we will see how they hold up. For one our old sheets are thicker looking  but that is all I see as a difference. I hope they hold up to many washes as our old one have. But all in all, we have new sheets and they fit and it didn't cost me the regular price that I was use too spending. I'm pleased.
title: Sheets are reasonable price, many colors to choose from

author: nds09
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2020
review_content: We have a temperpedic split king and have only used sheets made with the elastic across the corners to prevent the sheet from popping off when we raise/lower the head and foot of the bed. Also, we needed deep pockets and basically, two twin fitted sheets and a king flat sheet. I had read rave reviews on these sheets and was excited to see that a split king was available. Even if they didn't work, the price was right.  We have loved these since we put them on the bed! They stay on the temperpedic mattresses with the head/foot raising! They are soft, wrinkle free, and wash well. we will be purchasing a second set soon.
title: comfy sheets!
verified: Size: Split King SetColor: Light GrayVerified Purchase

author: Hiacynth Bouquet
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2020
review_content: Optimally I prefer a heavier quality sheet but they cost a lot more These sheets aren’t wrinkle free just wrinkle resistant  Best approach is to dry ea sheet separately so that there’s plenty of room in the dryer Remove them from dryer while they’re still warm to fold them  Another trick - don’t dry pillow cases with fitted sheet They inevitably end up in a wet ball of massive wrinkles caught in the corner of fitted sheet  I always dry pillow cases with flat sheet Takes longer but sheets look better  If you don't mind a thinner sheet and want one that is very soft for a fabulous price these sheets are for you!
title: Best advantage is softness & price

author: Tugiam
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2019
