review_content: I LIKE:1. Sheets are soft.2. They are very white.3. The pillowcases are pretty.4. The fabric is thin, but that doesn't bother me.I DON'T LIKE:1. Bottom sheet is too deep and baggy for my Purple mattress (9.25 inches). I have to do a lot of pulling and tucking to get a smooth fit.2. The elastic all the way around the fitted sheet is very small and reminds me of one of my first sewing projects in 7th grade Home EC class.3. Seams on the top sheet are puckery on all four sides.4. Crunchy, scratchy tags that can't be cut all the way off w/o opening the seam.5. Not a fan of the type of pillowcase - open seam on the back side. None of my pillows will stay put.
title: Hard Pass - Don't Recommend

author: Kenzie T
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2019
review_content: I don’t think I have any weird health issues or anything related to getting hot at night, but occasionally I get warm. Usually I just roll to another spot and can cool off quickly. NOT WITH THESE SHEETS. Although they are extremely soft, they feel like an oven every. Single. Night. I use to get hot at night about once a week. Now it’s literally every single night. I can’t knock them too bad because they are gloriously soft, but it’s really affecting my quality of sleep because they just keep the heat locked in, and there is no cool spot to roll to like with cotton sheets. Had to knock another star off too because they arrived with stains that even the washer couldn’t remove. I would only recommend these sheets to people who stay extremely cold all night through. It’s winter and I’m sweating to death. I can’t imagine how bad it’ll be during summer
title: If you get hot at night, these are NOT for you.

author: Amber D.C.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2020
review_content: This is my 5th set of this brand of sheets I have bought. I love them! I have bought three queen sets (red, purple, and royal blue) a two set (royal blue), and a king set (purple). I Recently noticed that a set I had bought a year and a half ago had started ripping on the seam. I sent the company an email and within a few hours I had my money back. No questions asked, and no picture showing the problem. I love this company! I just bought this set of the royal blue and it’s gorgeous. I wish they would make blankets (beyond the quilt) and other bed items! I love this company!
title: Best sheets and customer service

author: Susan
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2020
review_content: I ordered these sheets due to a recommendation and the high ratings. Don’t waste your $. I had high hopes. I received them, and opened them up. First thing I noticed was that there was a huge run going down the middle of the fitted sheet. I was disappointed, but decided to try them anyway. I washed them, and put them on the bed. Within 2 days, my husbands pillowcase pilled horribly. Like it was falling apart. He shaves his head, so I’m thinking maybe the back and forth rubbing of his hair growing out? But I have never experienced this with any other sheets. I looked online, and they have a pretty incredible guarantee. It says to email them, and they will refund your $ and let you keep them. I figured I’d try that, but it has been IMPOSSIBLE to get through to Amazon. I keep trying the call back option and it doesn’t work, and they ended up blocking my # after trying to reach them 3 Or 4 times. The chat is useless. They are all automated responses, and incredibly frustrating. You can’t get through to anyone.
title: You get what you pay for.

author: sd721
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2018
review_content: I absolutely love these sheets! I originally ordered a set back in 2016 and was a little hesitant about ordering sheets online (since I couldn’t feel them, haha!) or check to see if the color would really match my room. But based on the positive reviews, I decided to give them a try. They were so inexpensive that it seemed worth the risk. I’m so glad I did! I instantly loved how soft and comfortable they were. The color was very true to what they showed online.Right after I put them on my bed my sister and her husband came for a visit, and I let them use my room for their stay. The next morning, one of the first things my sister wanted to know was where I got my sheets because she and her husband thought they were so comfortable. They were so surprised when I told them they were from Amazon and how affordable they were.The reason I am writing the review now is because I just ordered my second set and once again fell in love with my bed. This set is just as soft and comfy as the last one, and last night I felt like I was being hugged by the softest t-shirt. If you want something that feels very silky or satiny or cool to the touch, these might not be for you. But if you want a durable, inexpensive sheet set that happens to also be one of the softest sheets you will ever feel, then I highly recommend.My first set did start to pill after awhile, BUT I have not deducted any stars for it because 1. I probably wasn’t washing it on the best wash setting. I’m going to wash this set on a more gentle cycle. And 2. They were the only sheets I was using for my bed for almost 2 years straight, with no breaks, except to just take them off, wash them and put them back on. So I’m pretty sure I wore them out and I feel for the price, I got my money’s worth.I will be ordering more in the future! Thanks Mellanni! Love these sheets!
title: Love these sheets! Inexpensive and SO COMFORTABLE!

author: Edwin H Kraft
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2018
review_content: cheap and flimsy fabric and ripped after one wash; didn't have box, so had to pay UPS $15.23 for a box to return.  JUNK, do not buy.AMAZON, this is one of at least 3 sets of sheets I've had to return to you.  I have lost confidence that you are selling a quality product.AMAZON, please tell me how to get my $15.23 that I had to pay yesterday for a box to return this defective item to you.Thanks, Ginny Kraft
title: flimsy fabric; pillow case came apart at seam after first wash

author: Kati
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2019
review_content: THESE ARE SO NICE!I typically spend far more on sheets than I'm willing to admit to, but after seeing 50k+ positive reviews, I figured it sure wouldn't hurt to try these out...especially since I'd bought them as gifts for my brother haha He had great things to say about them, but the typical twenty-something year old male really doesn't sway my opinion on things like sheets. I am SOOOOOOO glad I decided to give these a try. My lab and shepherd successfully ripped another set of very expensive sheets, so I was definitely in a bind to get new ones ordered. I ordered these the same night as having to sleep on said ripped sheets and they arrived in less than 2 days. I quickly washed them, which made them even softer, and haven't looked back since! I will definitely be ordering more sets for all beds in our home.
title: simply put - amazing!

author: Disappointed
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2020
review_content: Well, took a chance on these inexpensive, highly-touted sheets, and once again was taught the age-old lesson that YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR!All the pillowcases -- both Standard and King -- are not stitched across the top of one entire side! (See photo) Makes for a terribly messy, sloppy look and of course my foot will end up entwined inside one of these flappy, sloppy pillowcases every night because I am side-sleeper.There are also small dark spots on both the fitted and flat sheet!DO NOT BUY THESE CHEAP, LOUSY MELLANNI SHEETS!
title: MELLANNI NOT WORTH A SHEET!

author: Connie Leuenberger
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2020
review_content: I needed to get some new sheets during the pandemic, as mine had ripped. I normally don’t write reviews, or buy sheets online, but I didn’t have much of a choice during the pandemic. When the sheets arrived they felt very soft to the touch so I was happy. But, after sleeping in them for almost three weeks, I went back to my ripped sheets! First, they seem too long for my king sized bed, and the width feels too short.  The worst part was sleeping on them felt like sleeping on a bathing suit or under armour shirt. The fabric is just not right for sheets. They also seem to get very hot. The weird microfiber does make for very quick and easy drying.  Good if you need to dry your sheets fast. I just couldn’t get used to the feel. I’m not a sheet snob and sleep in sheets from Target or Walmart, but this fabric is weird.
title: Felt like sleeping on a bathing suit

author: Toni Airaksinen
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2020
review_content: I purchased the California King sheets in Imperial/Royal Blue. When the sheets arrived, they were more purple than blue. I threw them in the wash to hopefully drain the purple color out of them, but it didn't work. Overall, they are soft and true to size, but I was dissapointed by how different the color was. I was hoping for sheets that were blue, not basically purple. (And yes, I asked my housemate today: what color is this? she said "purple?" so it's not just my eyes playing tricks on me.Otherwise, if you're not picky on color, these would be good for you.
title: The color was not accurate...
verified: Size: California KingColor: Imperial BlueVerified Purchase

author: L
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2019
review_content: I’ve never written a review, nor was I ever compelled to... until these sheets. They’re comfortable, breathable and all for a really low price.I never really understood the hoopla about sheet comfort, I’ve slept just fine on anything from 10$ sheets to frette 1000$ sheets... but these sheets are a whole another ball game.Soft is an understatement when it comes to describing their texture. They feel like what sleeping on a cloud feels like.They’re not strangely slippery like satin sheets, and but feel amazing on the skin. They don’t seem to pull.Its only been two days, and haven’t washed them yet. So I’ll update after a wash and see how they hold up.
title: These sheets beat cuddling.

author: David
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2019
review_content: The colors are bright and pleasing to the eye. The sheets looked very nice when I put them on my bed. Unfortunately, they FEEL cheap and almost like spun or woven plastic. They’re cool to the touch and will feel great in the summer, but they’re chilly winter sheets.The elastic in the fitted sheets felt brittle. Just by stretching it to put it on the corners, I worried it would snap inside the sheet and I’d be left with essentially two top sheets instead of one fitted and one regular. I’m curious how many wash and dry cycles that elastic will survive.These sheets look nice, but I won’t buy another set.
title: Feels cheap and almost plastic.
verified: Size: QueenColor: Quatrefoil Navy BlueVerified Purchase

author: Janelle
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2020
review_content: I bought this sheet set in search for a quality, affordable bedding option. My first impression of the sheets was that were pretty soft. I have spent a lot of money on sheets before and these were just as soft as my high thread count, expensive ones. They also have deep pockets for my large pillow top mattress. They do, however, slide up the sides after about a week on the bed, making the sheets look stretched out. The product does stay wrinkle free like advertised. The only other negative about these sheets is that they are thin. I did order white sheets, but you can see the mattress pattern through them. I have not bought a color set so I can’t say if you can see through those or not. Although thin, they held up well in the washer and dryer. I would not classify these as cooling sheets, but they are not hot like other sheets I have tried. Overall, I would recommend these sheets if you are looking for a good quality sheet set that isn’t crazy expensive.
title: Quality Sheets for the Price

author: Jennifer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2019
review_content: These sheets are fantastic! They’re so comfortable and vibrant. You are truly getting a steal on the price and comfort of these sheets. Egyptian cotton, high count threads eat your heart out! I ordered this colour in “Coral.” It’s so vibrant and kept its colour through its first washing! I ordered it in the “king” size as I have a queen but with two mattress toppers. This is my first order and certainly won’t be my last. Even my roommate was surprised at the quality and texture. They are on the “thinner” side and more of use for summer sleeping. I prefer thinner sheets as I would rather be cooler when I sleep and it makes for an easier wash. If you’re looking for thicker sheets, and if you reside in a cooler climate, then I wouldn’t recommend these sheets for that purpose solely.The comments on these sheets are comprised of mostly positive, excellent remarks. For those who claim they are not soft I would recommend to return them and try again. There is bound to be a lemon, or in this case, a different manufacturer, that possibly made those sorts of sheets. At least give them a try again after one return. I really think they’re amazing and worth it. Let’s be honest, for 30$ can you really go wrong...?
title: Comfortable and cool - perfect bedsheets are here!

author: Little Book Worm
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2019
review_content: First the positive - these sheets are excellent quality.  The material, stitching, and dye are all good.  Unfortunately, they simply do not measure up to the last set I received.  The last set is so soft and comfortable, that I literally have to roll around every time I get in them just to feel the softness against my skin.  My husband I and loved them so much that we decided to get a second set in another color.  Unfortunately, these are just standard sheets.  They aren't particularly soft, and that's super disappointing given that it is the only reason that I ordered them.
title: Not as good as the last ones

author: Kayla Mason
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2020
review_content: This is my third set of these sheets (previously ordered gray this time royal blue). I was absolutely in love with my last two sets and couldn't wait to get a matching pair with my new bed spread. My most current order the sheets are a completely different texture, thin to the point they're see-through and not nearly as soft as my previous orders and came slightly stained. Seriously disappointed.
title: Inconsistent Quality

author: Vanessa
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2020
review_content: White, king size, striped: I suspect others who have reviewed these sheets got a product much different than what I received. My sheets are very thin (literally, see-through), the stitching is poor, the elastic that surrounds the fitted sheet is 1/4" wide at best and the sheets feel far more polyester than brushed cotton/microfiber as described. Overall the quality is very poor. I didn't expect much for $35, but the reviews suggested they may be good. I did wash them to see if that would help - it did not. I should have known better than to skimp on sheets.  They're being returned today.
title: Even at $35, these sheets are overpriced.

author: Angela Victoria
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2019
review_content: Was a little worried, as reviews said they were thin-I have a dog that thinks my bed is a launch pad.They are thin, but hold up well. Colors stay bright and sharp. Sheets are probably on the warm side, with almost a brushed feel, but I run cold, and haven't felt sweaty even when I was.  Nice deep pockets, I do find they stay better with corner elastics, though. If I had one request it would be for the flat sheet to be a bit wider, there's barely enough to tuck in the sides.Planning to buy another set so I can switch them out easier, and more than wirrh the cost.
title: Good value!!

author: Josh
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2020
review_content: It was time to update my bed spread situation so I hit the Amazon world. Sleeping cool is my biggest priority. My previous set was Sheex and they were OK, once you got used to the stretchiness. I decided to get these guys this time around (much cheaper!) and so far, so great! Haven't gotten to the warm season here in the Southwest yet but these are very comfortable so far. I suppose one silver lining of the world shutting down for the virus is that I get to spend as long as I want each morning snuggled in these sheets. And there's no stretchiness :)
title: Love these new sheets

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2019
review_content: I've slept on satin sheets before. These are soft without the slippery feel of satin. I guess it would be what sleeping on my silk shirts would feel like. I've never purchased microfiber sheets before. However the sheets are incredibly thin. They're the only sheets that I have where I cover my head and can see details of things in the room when the light is on. I don't know if this is a feature of the 'microfiber' material or not. Living in the tropical Caribbean, I think that this is not such a bad thing. My other sheets feel heavy and trap body heat during the night. However with these, I felt cool and fresh throughout the night as if the sheets had 'wicking' properties.
title: Soft as silk!

author: Kim Glover
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2020
review_content: Because research states that sleep is so important for well being I decided to invest in good quality sheets. Before I bought these sheets I had bought some that were twice as much. I honestly can't tell the difference between them. These sheets are soft, cool, fit, and hold up well. The one time I needed help from their customer service the response was responsive and helpful. I can't recommend these sheets and company enough!
title: Soft and cool

author: Skyskape
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2020
review_content: These are good sheets that I will continue to buy whenever I need an affordable sheet set. I don't like the tan color. It looks more tawny and I was expecting more of a grayish-beige tone. But the price is right and they are soft, comfortable and good quality. They hold up after years of use and multiple washes. I've bought three sets already. One weird thing that happened with this last one is it seems to have gotten stained, maybe by the laundry soap somehow, and the stain is here to stay. Nothing removes it. Oh well, guess I'll buy another set!
title: Not A Great Color, But A Decent Product

author: Andrew
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2020
review_content: I would first like to say the only reason I gave this product a 2 Star rating was because of their customer support team. The company does have a 100% money back guarantee and they really do mean it. I emailed about disappointment and was refunded even on the set of sheets I had already washed.So there really is NO risk in purchasing. Some people obviously love them but for those of us who don't you'll get your hard earned money back.Now these sheets were a good deal and one of the patterns I bought (the tiny blue polka dots) looked amazing. When I first opened them and felt them in the packaging I was hopeful.Taking them out of the packaging I instantly knew these were terrible sheets. They were thin. Like so thin that your could hold them up to the light and see through. Thought well I'll wash them and give them a shot.Awful.The feeling of these sheets on my skin was cringeworthy, you could definitely feel that they were made from a synthetic material. I tossed and turned for 15 minutes and ripped them off the bed.They are NOT luxurious or soft. They are a tissue paper thin joke. The fact that so many people love them is disconcerting.Love yourself and PASS on these sheet.
title: Worst Sheets EVER.
verified: Size: FullColor: Striped – Gray / SilverVerified Purchase

author: Lex Murphy
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2020
review_content: I was skeptical because they aren’t cotton but these sheets are great. They are cool and soft. The extra deep pocket sheets are huge so I wish I had ordered the regular ones. They are super easy to clean. My son had a nose bleed and the blood wiped off and washed off easily. I wish the design detail in the pillow cases was on the flat sheet also but other than that these sheets are perfect!
title: Awesome sheets!
verified: Size: EXTRA DEEP pocket - KingColor: WhiteVerified Purchase

author: madam queen
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2019
review_content: I bought these sheets specifically for the deep pockets.  I bought a set for myself and a set for my friend.  I have a deeper mattress, his is an old fashioned one so not as deep.  We put the sheets on his bed and they were fine, he said they were very comfortable, he was pleased.  I haven't had a chance to try mine yet but judging from his, the pockets are not as deep as I anticipated, so I hope they will fit my mattress.  I have one pair of sheets that have an 18" pocket, which fit with room to spare, but I wanted a second set so I didn't have to struggle with trying to use my old fashioned sheets when the deep pocket set needed to be washed, so I got these.  II like the colors - I got a terrific red (my favorite color) and for him I got the silver stripes.  All in all I think I'm pleased with the purchase.
title: Seem okay so far
verified: Size: QueenColor: Striped – Gray / SilverVerified Purchase

author: Michelle Dial
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2020
review_content: I saw a post on Facebook about 26 Amazon things you absolutely need. Well this sheet set showed up and I purchased! bc well who honestly wants to spend hundreds on sheets and possibly not like them. Well here is my review.......If you enjoy being hot you will love these. If you enjoy the feeling of having a sheet cling to your skin you will love them even more. I overall hate the sheet set! It's miserably hot, they are clingy to your skin & the sides pop off of the mattress.  I personally do not like them and will not buy again.
title: Awful

author: PRoberts
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2020
review_content: People like words that they are familiar with, even if they don't know what-in-the-heck they mean. Egyptian cotton is one. People assume Egyptian cotton is the top of the sheet world, that any sheets that are made of this magical thread woven by the pharaohs themselves must be the best. All I'm requesting is that you do your research. The good news is you probably have if you are looking at Mellani bed sheets. These are phenomenal. Soft, silky, and cool like a fall breeze. I have used these for over a year, they show little sign of wear. I'll definitely buy again.
title: Better than pesky Egyptian Cotton

author: Joni Joni
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2018
review_content: These sheets were comfortable and, with deep pockets, they fit perfectly on our Cal King mattress.  In the past, we spent nearly $200 on a cotton set which feels great, yet doesn't fit as well as this affordable set!  We worried that the microfiber would feel too "synthetic", but they were not. The first night of use, my husband also said he liked the feel and lighter weight. Before using, I washed and dried these as directed. There were still fold lines and some wrinkles when they came out of the dryer, but they smoothed right out when I put them on the bed.  Also, the white color was just what we needed to give light to our room and a fresh look to our existing bedding!  We are going to repurpose our old sets and buy more of these Mellanni sets!
title: Comfortable, Fits Well

author: Becca
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2020
review_content: These sheets are horrible. I ordered a queen size for my queen bed and queen pillows... sheets are ALWAYS pulling up and does not completely cover my pillow. I bought these sheets 3 months and they are already “picky” in the spots where my husband and I lay. They also “catch” on dry skin due to the microfiber material. They are soft at the beginning, but these are INDEED to good to be true... so disappointed. Especially with all the amazing reviews.
title: Do not buy..

author: Katie D
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2020
review_content: I  figured 70,000 reviewers can't be all that wrong. I  guess I have higher sheet standards. In the package these felt okay. I  pulled them out of the package and couldn't believe how THIN and cheap they felt. I folded them back up and am shipping them back tomorrow. I  have Target sheets that feel better than these - luxurious, even. I  was really disappointed and confused as to why there is so much hype about these inexpensive sheets. Buyer beware!
title: Flimsy and feel cheap
verified: Size: QueenColor: Striped – Gray / SilverVerified Purchase

author: Doc from Texas
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2020
review_content: I did a lot of research on microfiber sheets before buying the Mellanni twin sheets.  The Mellanni brand was rated high on other websites that recommended a listing of microfiber sheets.  What they need to tell the customer (right up front) is they come wrinkled.... and the washing and drying does NOT solve the problem.  On the tag they state not to iron, but I finally had to resort to ironing them on a low polyester setting to remove the wrinkles so the sheets did not look like they had been slept in for several years.  Had I known that the wrinkles were so terrible and regular washing and drying did not take care of the problem... I would have not bought them.  Now that I have them and all the wrinkles are pressed out, I hope they hold up.
title: Be ready to iron

author: Linda from PT
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2019
review_content: The only problem is they stretch so have to be re tucked every morning. I agree with this reviewer. We specifically bought these sheets because they were oversized and had elasticized borders on the fitted sheet. The sheets come off during the night and have to be refitted in the morning. We have a TempurPedic mattress that we raise at night. Just put extra pressure on the fitted sheet. The Sonoro Kate Cal King sheets we ordered at the same time stay on our oversized bed beautifully.
title: We recycled these and bought the Sonoro Kate Cal King

author: Calyssa
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2020
review_content: I bought the king sheets in Royal Blue and they are such a beautiful color! However, I was hoping that they were a little softer and cooler than they actually are. I don’t have an issue with thinner sheets since I usually sleep bundled up with a fleece blanket and comforter, but I can’t with these sheets! They actually make me HOTTER and uncomfortable. I have been waking up in the middle of the night which was never a problem until I got these sheets. Also, The sheets aren’t scratchy, but they definitely aren’t soft or buttery like some reviews say. Great for having an extra set of sheets without paying a lot, but I wouldn’t recommend these for daily use as they aren’t comfortable.
title: Eh, pretty sheets but I can’t say I love the quality

author: Dustin Edwards
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2020
review_content: I don't understand the rating these sheets have. I have purchased a better product at walmart.1. Loose fitting on my 12" deep queen mattress leaving an excessive amount of fabric on the bed. Perhaps they are wrinkle free, but you can't tell since it isn't a snug fit.2. Other reviews claim them to be "soft", but they have the feel of cheap toilet paper you'd find in a porta potty at an outdoor concert venue.3. Overall quality feels cheap. It's what I would expect if I were to purchase the bottom of the line sheets at walmart.
title: Overrated.

author: MachoBunny
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2020
review_content: The low price may leave you doubting. You can pay 5 to 10 times the price and get something that sounds better, but so far I prefer these to the more expensive choices. Fact is, ALL Bamboo sheets are made the same way and the hype artists try to make their chemical rendering sound better than others. BS.That said, I do not know how well these will last. Been thru the wash one time, came out with no wrinkles. The expensive kind come out VERY wrinkled.I think the value is here and if that changes I'll come back and change this review.
title: YOU WANT THESE SHEETS

author: Lisa
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2019
review_content: While I love the color (haven’t used yet), I’ve received the wrong size twice. The first time I received a king size (needed a twin), wasn’t 100% if on my end or the company’s. No biggie, sent back unopened with a note on the return to send a twin size. New package came promptly. Received the package 2 weeks or so ago, hadn’t opened yet, wasn’t in a rush. Just now opened 5 minutes ago and again it’s a king size. I had requested through the proper channels (via amazon’s return links and chat) to correct the size upon the return. My biggest issue is that I live in the Netherlands. So even with the return and some reimbursement for mailing fees, it still doesn’t cover the whole mailing fees to return the sheets. Which means, I would be out even more money returning yet again the wrong size. This is where my frustration is setting in. I was willing to incur some of the mailing fee the first time I returned the package (really like the color), but a second time (even after noting via proper channels that I needed the Emerald Green in size: Twin), kinda makes my eyes crossed lol. Trying to add a wee bit of humor to offset my frustration.
title: Return/Reorder, still wrong size

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2019
review_content: The white color is a pure white, but my set had a few tiny dark spots in a couple of places. Material is soft, however, very thin -- this is not a thick sheet set by any means if that's what you're looking for. Is it wrinkle resistant?... I suppose? They definitely do not come out of the washer/dryer with zero noticeable creases. But since the material is so thin, the wrinkles sort of smooth out as you're pulling it taut to make the bed, giving the illusion that the wrinkles have disappeared. Note that the decorative stitching is present on the pillow cases ONLY. The queen size fitted sheet was able to fully cover an 13.5"H queen mattress. I would not buy again, but if you're in the market for a thin, soft, extremely affordable sheet set then this would be a good purchase.
title: Material is soft but very thin.

author: Katie B
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2019
review_content: I read some reviews and was excited about purchasing these sheets! The first night sleeping in my bed I was ready to throw the sheets out! I washed them prior to putting them on my bed but they are very loud and ruffled sounding when you move on them. I also found them to be very hot!! I was somewhat ok with that because I usual am cold at night but I had to remove some clothes. My biggest pet peeve is the fitted sheet does not stay on the mattress. It’s like the sheet lacks elasticity nor does it have as deep of pockets as I’d like.I’m super bummed And will not purchase these sheets again. For anyone that claims these feel like $200 sheets are false advertising.
title: Would not buy these sheets again!!

author: RestlessTime
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2020
review_content: I had never heard of this company but the reviews were good so I took a chance.  I ordered a twin set, in lavender which is my granddaughter's favorite color.  The color is vibrant and really attractive.  The set washed so beautifully.  The sheets and pillowcase are soft and wrinkle free.  The pockets are very large and can accommodate a variety of mattress sizes.  Best of all, the fitted sheet is a complete breeze getting on.  If you have arthritic fingers you know how difficult it is getting a fitted sheet on the bed.  Easy peasy, no pain at all.  Love these sheets.
title: So easy to put on the mattress

author: Nancy S
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2019
review_content: I was expecting SO much from these sheets based on all the reviews but unfortunately, these sheets fell short for me. The sheets felt soft on my hand when in the package but were awful to sleep on! I get hot at night and tend to roll around a lot and these were WAY too hot and almost uncomfortable to roll around on. My skin did not glide over these sheets like they do with my 300 thread count cotton sheets, and that’s a pretty low thread count so I think that says a lot. The sheets were washed prior to use (with a fabric softener, I might add) and came out of the dryer looking great but to me, that’s all they were, great LOOKING sheets. Yes, they are very thin and lightweight and feel like they’re made very well and could be great for the price but unfortunately, I won’t be buying these again. We also used a brand new comforter on our first night of use with these sheets (and a throw as I live in Wisconsin and it can get awfully cold on winter nights) and I plan on removing the throw this evening to see if I sleep better on night two and if I’m still hot, I’ll change the comforter next and if other results are found, I will update this review accordingly but for now, I’m not a fan.
title: Disappointed by these sheets

author: Llama
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2020
review_content: I occasionally will get something cheap from walmart because I need it not that I want it. So quality is not a concern like my guest bedroom. These sheets are that quality but instead of being cheap they are just overpriced, I dont recommend them for anyone even your guest.
title: Walmart Quality

author: Kimberlee
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2020
review_content: My husband and I desperately needed some—new sheets.  We usually go to a local store and get a 1,000 thread count set of sheets for around 40/50 dollars.  I am blown away by these sheets.  They are So soft, comfortable, easy to put on your bed, and they do not pull up on one corner while you sleep like all of our other sheets.  Oh, and if you want to make bed-making easy, the tag on your fitted sheet goes on the bottom left corner.  I was amazed, and I cannot believe I have gone most of my.lofe without knowing that!  The price point on these sheets is as fantastic as how comfortable they are!!
title: Amazing and a great price.

author: Taylor
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2020
review_content: Okay guys, I'm a sheet snob. I buy expensive sheets and can't stand low quility. These are uh-maze-inggggggg! So soft and comfortable. A bit thinner than the sheets I normally buy but really it doesn't affect the quility. I have already bought two sets in less than an month and will be buying more since there are so many color choices! I over think things, stress myself out and read way too many reviews. Something like these took me months of overthinking before I decided to just try them. So if you are like me just do it. It's free returns so if you don't like them, send them back. But I bet you will like them!
title: Stop over thinking and just buy them

author: Sommer Hallock
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2019
review_content: I purchased these sheets after purchasing another set of sheets off of Amazon that were absolutely horrible. I received these sheets in a very nicely packaged zipper bag. As soon as I opening them, I loved the texture and how soft the sheets were. I was hesitant about purchasing sheets that weren't cotton, but these are better than cotton! They feel like Egyptian cotton or a high-thread count sheet. They fit my mattress perfectly and are so comfortable. I've washed them quite a few times and they're holding together just fine. I definitely recommend these sheets to anyone looking for cozy, soft, inexpensive sheets that look fabulous!
title: Great sheets! Cozy, soft, comfortable, love the material! Machine washable! Definitely recommend!

author: N Pringle
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2018
review_content: The color of these sheets is NOTHING like what was pictured online. I ordered 2 extra pillowcases in the same color (Blue Hydrangea), and the color of the extra pillowcases not only doesn't match the website color, but does not match the sheet set that is supposed to be the same color either. I really wish I had noticed this before I washed them so I could send it all back. Very disappointed.
title: Color does not match website

author: KA
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2019
review_content: REEKS OF CHINESE TOXIC CHEMICAL SMELL. Before I even got the cover off, my eyes started watering, my throat got scratchy, and I got a headache. My dog walked by and couldn’t stop sneezing.Shame on this manufacturer.  How can they live with themselves knowing they are sending POISONOUS CHEMICALS around th world for people to breathe in all night long?  They and their families should be forced to inhale these chemicals all night. DESPICABLE.  SHAME!!  They should be in prison for assault!
title: POISONOUS “MADE IN CHINA” SMELL

author: Tiffany
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2020
review_content: So far, amazing!! I ordered these sheets based on an IG influencer’s rec. I’ve washed and folded them only at this point but they’re amazingly soft, wrinkle free, and seem to be very high quality! I purchased them for my son’s “big boy bed!” After we use them a few times I’ll update my review if anything changes. I’m already anticipating ordering a set for my bed!
title: So far, great!

author: Elizabeth
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2020
review_content: The sheet set is very soft but the material is very thin. The elastic on the fitted sheet is not strong enough to stay tucked under the mattress and the pillow cases extend way past the size of a king pillow which makes them look very droopy.
title: Buyers beware

author: Julie
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2020
review_content: I don’t ever write reviews, but I got suckered. These sheets came highly recommended by an influencer and I decided to give them a try. They are the WORST sheets I’ve ever purchased. They are very thin and see-through, HOT, and too soft (yes, like an uncomfortable soft). After one wash, they already feel like I’ve had them for years. They are very poor quality and I’m so disappointed. I don’t even want to continue using them and I just bought them. I don’t know why these are so highly recommended because they’re just terrible!
title: HOT, see-through, poor quality

author: Joe
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2019
review_content: Yes, these sheets are wrinkle resistant and very soft. But, they do not lay flat or stay on my mattress and they bunch up uncomfortably. I have a 14” high tempur-pedic mattress plus a two inch foam topper, PLUS a mattress cover, so it’s certainly not because my mattress is too thin! I think the material that makes them so soft is the reason they slide around. Every morning I have to almost remake the bed. The corners are not stretched out, but the fitted sheet still doesn’t stay in place. I might purchase those straps that go around the mattress corners to hold it in place—but I shouldn’t have to.
title: Fitted sheet bunches up and comes off corners

author: LightPixie
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2018
review_content: The packaging of the sheet sets was elegant and refined but I'd prefer the effort be put toward higher quality. The sheets themselves ere made with very long, loose stitches that seemed insubstantial and prone to catching. In one of the two sets I received the top and bottom sheets did not match in color--one was a noticeable shade darker than the other. As shipped in the package the bottom sheet was very wrinkled so I washed the entire set in warm, not hot water and dried them on the gentle cycle. The wrinkles did not release so I sent the entire order back. I will say that the microfiber fabric was very nice and probably quite comfortable.
title: Adequate for the cost but not great

author: jdh
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2017
review_content: These sheets are probably the best on the market for the price. This is the 3rd set I have purchased and they continue to get softer after every wash. Really never thought about sheets until my wife wanted to buy some kind of  $200 set of gold plated sheets. I immediately started searching and these sheets had great reviews and price was outstanding! Old sheets were just ok but after seeing and feeling the difference the sheets provided I actually for once seen that there is a difference in how sheets feel and the overall comfort they provide and the sleep I get actually is better. Bottom line these sheets made a huge difference that I could actually feel! Great price and fantastic quality! Other sheet manufacturers should be scared as they will start losing business to Mellanni bed sheets! Real unpaid honest review!  So tired of reading paid reviews! They should not allow any paid reviews!
title: Sheets that can't be BEAT!

author: Tamara Pruett
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2020
review_content: We absolutely LOVE these sheets. They wash well, are very soft and do not wrinkle more than our high thread count sheets. They are thinner however we love that about them. They do remind us of hotel sheets in that they are soft and light. The pillowcases are soft, do not come off and as a bonus they keep me from having bed head lol (like a satin pillowcase).
title: Highly recommend!! Will buy again!!
verified: Size: KingColor: Striped – Light BlueVerified Purchase

author: erlea
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2019
review_content: I really wanted to love these sheets. They are very soft and feel nice considering they are extremely thin.  The “cooling” factor seems effective at first but after a little while laying under I feel like I’m roasting-so maybe they’ll be better in the winter but definitely doesn’t work for me as advertised. These are also very easily snagged.  Also, maybe I just got a defective fitted sheet, but it is huge. And with the elastic going all the way around it makes it hard to stay in place. I feel like I’m constantly having to tuck it in-which I’ve NEVER had to do with a fitted sheet. These also seem to be a lint magnet, so probably not the best idea if you have pets.
title: Not the greatest

author: Renae Edwards
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2020
review_content: These are the softest sheets I've ever had! I'm really not that picky with sheets, so I've always bought according to price and color. These were a great deal for California King, so I bought a set. Wow, am I impressed! Softness and quality is amazing at this price. I should also mention that my mattress is extra thick, and they fit perfectly. Not once has a corner pulled off. I will be buying more of these. Highly recommended!
title: Incredibly soft and great quality!

author: Restrected
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2019
review_content: Torn right in one of the corners. Material is good for thenprice point but the workmanship leaves alot to be desired.I tried to open a return but time is up. I bought 5 of those in different color and i didnt open them until my new mattress came. That was too long so i ran out of time for returns. So this set goes to garbage. Crossing my fingers for last set.The first 3 sets were “ok”. Meaning, looks fine on first look. The seams on the fitted sheet are not good at all. The rest of the seams look fine. But the fitted sheet workmanship is really low quality. On all of them. This set was torn and open in one of the corners!! Completely open!!!Still. For the price its an ok product. Nothing to go crazy over or make this a best selling product, but ok. I would not buy again. Material is good but if stiches are coming apart on their own before even being out of the package that tells me quality control and workmanship is low grade. So no thank you! Not buying again.
title: Bad quality control. Good material but bad workmanship

author: Cara
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2019
review_content: I would never EVER think I would order sheets from Amazon. Mostly because I feel like I need to be able to feel the material beforehand. But guys. How could this many reviews be wrong? So I took a chance, ordered white and waited for them to come in. Oh my god are these sheets great. They honestly feel like higher end hotel sheets. The only issue that we found is that the king sized sheets were quite a bit larger than the actual mattress. Not a huge deal, just something I found interesting. We promptly ordered another set recently and will probably continue to do so when our other ones get shredded by our cat.
title: Happy Sheets

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2018
review_content: UPDATE THREE MONTHS LATER:You will sweat. I wake up. I am sweating. Not every night. But enough nights. Still trying to hold out replacing them because they are pretty and affordable. And honestly I tend to get warm easily which probably makes me more sensitive to the warmth of the sheets. If you are a person who is usually cold you can get them. But if you're like me and run a bit hot (Holla at my full figured friends) maybe reconsider.Original review:Very soft and pretty, and you can beat the price. When I said I was buying polyester sheets, my whole family lost their minds and told me I would sweat every night. Look, they aren't cotton. They do sleep hotter than cotton. But it isn't the crisis situation everyone seemed to think it would be. They are good sheets, and great if you need an affordable starter set. Maybe eventually I'll break the bank for cotton, but for now I'm happy.
title: Liked them at first, but too hot. Finally replaced with 100% cotton. Dont buy these.
verified: Size: KingColor: Striped – Light BlueVerified Purchase

author: Savannah
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2019
review_content: These sheets were recommended by everyone and their mother so I took a chance on them. They were the same price as our previous sheets, but I thought we'd try something new. These sheets trap heat like no other sheets we have tried. It's borderline unbearable with no cold spots ever. My husband and I have mentioned how hot our bed is now. It's every night we get into bed and we have been sleeping on them for about two weeks. I will be switching sheets as soon as I can due to the heat of them. Otherwise, they fit well, have stayed crisp and clean. If you don't mind not having a cool side of the bed or pillow, then these are the sheets for you!
title: Lovely, but heat trapping. Not worth the hype

author: Deborah
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2019
review_content: It is not true about fitting up 16” mattresses. The pockets are not that deep at all. The only way I could use these sheets was to attach those stretchy bands with clips to all 4 corners of the bed to attempt to keep the bottom sheet on. Even with using those, it still slipped off the corners of the mattress. I ended up giving the sheets to my sister since her mattress is pretty thin. I thought the sheets themselves felt really nice and I am disappointed that they did not fit on my bed. I just wish I had read more reviews before wasting my money on these. What they advertise about the pockets fitting a mattress up to 16” deep was false in my experience. If you have a thin mattress, they would be nice sheets. Otherwise I wouldn’t buy them.
title: Pockets not deep enough for my mattress

author: Deb
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2019
review_content: I was very disappointed in this sheet set I usually base my purchases off of reviews and sometimes take my own chances I decided to buy these but was so dissapointed the sewing on the ends we're so poorly done there were black stains embedded into the sheets, I also noticed that the ivory color was different colors in other sections of the sheet meaning the sheets were not all one color , I could live with that but not the black marks embedded into the sewing material. I had every intention of returning these but the timeframe became too late so I decided to use these to cover up furniture in my basement.
title: Did not receive the quality as described by seller

author: BC
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2019
review_content: Thin like gossamer. Poorly finished. Maybe 300 thread count NOT 1,800 like the answers say. The cheapest product I have ever purchased. Unboxed and immediately packaged back up, then took my old stained sheets out of the trash to put back on my bed - as they are still far better quality.
title: Cheaply made. Avoid.
verified: Size: California KingColor: Striped – WhiteVerified Purchase

author: Shannon Joy
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2020
review_content: Based on the reviews, I thought these sheets would be softer. I have $100 Hotel Collection sheets I've used for years but I don't have that budget for new sheets. Everyone says they're crazy soft, which they are. But not buttery - more just smooth in texture.They're nice, but I think I'll try more a jersey knit next time for more buttery soft feeling.I also bought the pillow cases separately (my bed is a week and pillows are kings). OMG! The pillow cases were SOOOO soft. I left them a 5 star review. They are magic to sleep on.
title: Soft, but was reviews hyped it up

author: Pattib123
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2018
review_content: I purchased these sheets last July (2017), and have found them to be all that they claim. Soft and comfortable, wrinkle free and non shrink. Today I purchased my second queen set.  This is the best microfiber available at Amazon.  The price is amazing for the quality.  Over the last 4 years I have purchased several colors in several sizes, and have been extremely satisfied with the quality of this product.  Originally I thought, because they were not cotton, that they would make me sweat during the HOT Vegas summer.  Totally opposite case!  Love them! Buy with confidence!
title: Soft and cozy!

author: Steven Tillman
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2019
review_content: I have no idea why there is any relation to my night sweats and these sheets, but as soon as I put these on my bed, i have not sweat through a single night (been a couple weeks now) and this has been an ongoing annoyance for YEARS. I would wake up every morning totally soaked in a pool of sweat (might be related to my memory foam mattress) but this completely stopped after switching to these sheets. I had no expectation of this, i actually figured these sheets would increase the problem (only bought these because everyone says they are soft...they are soooo soft) - these feel sturdy and soft, i don't think they will fall apart after multiple wash cycles, but i can report back later if they do. So far, i absolutely love these sheets
title: I had serious issues sweating through the night before these

author: PhunkeJay
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2018
review_content: After reading several reviews (both good & bad) of these Mellanni Microfiber sheets I decided to take a chance and order a set. I figured $30 was a worthwhile price to take the gamble. I realize that not ever product made isn't going to have some missteps and a few faulty items are going to happen from time to time. And not everyone has the same tastes, requirements, criteria, and/or expectations of any given product purchase.That being said, my wife and I absolutely LOVE these sheets. They fit perfectly with nice deep pockets and are very soft and comfortable; surprisingly soft and comfortable for the price. My wife didn't know I ordered these sheets (after one of the sets of sheets we were using ripped). When I surprised her with this set, she was immediately impressed with the brand name and assumed I had spent too much money to replace an old worn out set of sheets. When I asked her what she thought I paid for these, she said "Probably about $90 or more." When I told her they cost $29.70 she looked at me like I was lying. Then she realized I was telling the truth and now she thinks I'm a genius. (I am a genius, but not just because I bought these sheets...)I (we) highly recommend the Mellanni Brushed Microfiber sheets. Now if you'll excuse me, I'd like to get back in bed!!!
title: Quality, Price, Softness

author: Peyton Jordan
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2020
review_content: *** UPDATE: unfortunately our white sheets have started holding some blue tint stains from the laundry detergent  ***I was skeptical about buying sheets that I couldn't feel before purchase, but this many good reviews does not lie. I had gone through several sets from target, walmart, etc. with significant pilling in short periods of time that was driving me nuts, and I buy everything on amazon so why not these too? I'm a few weeks into use and loving them so far! Super soft and cool. My only note is that they are a little thin, which is good for me but if you prefer something thicker you may need to spend a little more $$
title: I was iffy, glad I did it. See update

author: Lyn
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2020
review_content: I washed these prior to use and was pleased that they didn't seem to leak color. We have been using them for a few days only so I can't speak to how they hold their color over time but so far we have been pleased with the sheets. The color is very rich, (true to the color during purchase), and they are very soft. We have a pillow top mattress which adds a couple inches of height. The corners are deep enough to handle this added height without popping free during the night. The sides also completely cover the mattress and don't gap. I will be purchasing another couple sets in different colors.
title: Very Soft and Vibrant

author: Kathy B.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2020
review_content: I ordered the gray, and in the picture it looks more silver which is what I was going for... however, they are actually a much darker gray. I was going to return them because they weren’t what I had in mind, but I decided to just give them a shot. I washed them and put them on my bed, and they are without a doubt the BEST sheets I’ve ever owned. They are really soft and comfortable, and now I’m going to order more colors just to have on hand. I can’t speak to their durability yet as it’s only been two days, but I’ll update my review if necessary. Stop browsing the reviews and buy them immediately!
title: Best sheets ever!
verified: Size: KingColor: Striped – Gray / SilverVerified Purchase

author: coffeescripting
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2020
review_content: These are some of my favorite bedsheets that I've had the pleasure of using. They're soft and lovely to sleep on. I've bought a few different colors since 2018 and haven't noticed any decrease in quality or major shrinkage/wear and tear over times. If you're looking for a set of quality bedsheets I highly recommend these.
title: Soft & comfortable

author: Bill Lydon
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2020
review_content: I purchased the Mellanni queen sheets because they were highly rated and a reasonable price. They are very comfortable, lightweight, easy to wash, and dry. I used a Pendleton blanket that is a little small for my bed and so it does not get tucked in around the mattress. Because of the slick nature of the polyester material, my blanket slips all over the sheets so I wake up in the middle of the night and the blanket has slid halfway off the sheets and bed. I am a single guy and wonder how durable the sheets will be with prolonged use. Must say again they are very comfortable to sleep in but would look for a sheet in the future that has a more natural thread count.
title: Jury Still Out

author: Stamp My Art
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2019
review_content: Overall this is an average product.Positive:SoftNegatives:The width is too wide .... by enough to cause sagging in the product, though the length is fine. This makes it somewhat uncomfortable to sleep in as you move around and the fitted sheet shifts beneath you.Elastic on all sides of the fitted sheet cause consumer to have to try to figure out which is head and tail versus which are the sides. This could have been prevented by labeling heads and tails, which is something quality sheets employ.This is only the first day what product to use. Will update after several washings to see how product holds up
title: Has some upgrades necessary before becoming a quality product

author: InMyOpinion
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2020
review_content: From the picture I assumed it to be my fault that the she sheets would be somewhat silky with lines. Why? Because I have a pair with lines like the picture of the white sheets in white and taupe. There are no lines and it feels cheap. You can see through the pillow case which lets me know the fabric chosen will not last a long time. They will be used for guestroom. I will keep them but will keep in mind when ordering from the company or the name on the sheets, Melanni, to be careful.
title: InMyOpinion

author: Vanessa V
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2018
review_content: I don't love these sheets, but I don't hate them either. I purchased these on a whim because they were affordable and had deep pockets to fit the new mattress I just purchased. I'm used to cotton, linen, or even jersey sheets sometimes, so microfiber is a new one to me. After putting them on and feeling them, I was worried that I would sweat to death over night, but so far that hasn't been the case surprisingly. They held up during their first washing machine trip and have been slept on for a week. We shall see how they do with the next wash and use cycle. It's hard to find really good, affordable sheets.. especially the deep pocket kind.
title: Not terrible for the price..

author: Mary P Lewis
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2020
review_content: These sheets are lightweight, and soft. However, they do not fit the bed snugly. I have a king size bed and the “fitted” sheet is not fitted at all. It’s very loose, with rolls of loose fabric. I’ve tried tucking in the fitted sheet, but because of the type of fabric, they won’t stay tucked in. The bed is really messy. I’ve never had a problem with fitted sheets that are too loose, so I did not think to try them on the bed before washing them. Since I’ve already washed them, I’ll give these away to Goodwill.
title: Do not fit the bed!! Too loose!!

author: Jennifer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2018
review_content: These are fantastic! I heard about them on the Today show and immediately went online to look at the reviews. WOW! Although when I got them I was skeptical because of the material (microfiber), to be honest they felt cheap BUT that's not the case at all!! They aren't like true microfiber. They are soft, keep you cool and my bed didn't cold when I get in it. I've ordered multiple times. My family is getting them for Christmas! Who doesn't love great sheets and the price....I'm beyond thrilled I found these. Oh and I have a Tempur-Pedic bed which runs warms, these sheets help keep me cool. 😁
title: Don't hesitate, order these ASAP!

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2020
review_content: I bought these expecting them to be overhyped. I’ve seen them on SOO many of those “you need to buy this from amazon” or “things you need in your home NOW” lists on social media. I decided to take a shot since I’m not in the place to be dropping big money on Egyptian cotton.I am SO SHOCKED. These sheets live up to the hype! I never thought I’d ever say that I liked polyester sheets, but MAN these things are SOFT! I will warn, right out the bag they don’t feel very soft. It’s okay. Wash them first (which you should anyway, but I digress). They will feel very soft after a good wash! My mom actually mistook them for Egyptian cotton (and she’s notorious for only high thread count cotton). Wonderful purchase!
title: Lives up to the hype

author: Samuel
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2020
review_content: I was very upset at first because right out of the box there was an orange stain (apple sized) on my fitted sheet. I saw other reviews about it but I didn't think it'd happen to me. I always put a fleece blanket over my bedsheets anyway, so I decided to just wash it and cover it up so it was out of sight out of mind. The flat sheet and pillow cases were stain free and I LOVE them. I use the flat sheets during my daytime naps when its hot out but I still want to sleep with a blanket. The sheet and pillow cases do a great job of keeping me cool.
title: Stained fitted sheet but the rest were great

author: Long Time Kindle Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2019
review_content: When I opened this package my first thought was “flimsy”. BUT after washing, drying and putting them on the bed, my thought was “super soft”.I’ve only used them for 3 nights, but so far I really like them.  They did fit a queen bed, but the fitted sheet was a little snug on the corners.No stain issues. Again, wait and see.As to durability, we will wait and seeIf you don’t want to pay a lot for sheets, these are a great option.
title: Super soft Sheets

author: a girl has no name
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2020
review_content: if you’re like me and just looking for cute soft sheets these are the ones for you. I obviously can only speak to my experience, but these sheets aren’t a controversial buy if you’re not crazy opinionated on linen lol they’re super soft and I like them a lot. I don’t really write reviews but I was bored & figured covid has us all spending more time in bed so here we are. ok so I ordered the white ones with a light grayish blue paisley pattern for a full sized bed. I washed them once before use with no pilling or whatever. I didn’t go over them with a microscope but I didn’t see issues with the stitching or rips. idk why wrinkling is such a hot topic but it seems minimal. the only two things that might cause someone to continue the search is if you’re lookin for thicc boii sheets that hang low on the sides. when I put the fitted sheet on I thought it looked kinda thin but it’s fine once the flat sheet goes over. I didn’t have an opinion on sheet density, but I actually really like the weight. the flat sheet doesn’t have ton of extra fabric on the sides but ultimately tucks in under my mattress with more than enough for the foot of the bed. I’ll prolly order another set soon ~hoped this helped~
title: not a sheet expert
verified: Size: FullColor: Laced Sky BlueVerified Purchase

author: Shea
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2020
review_content: Super soft sheets I’m not going to lie I was skeptical at first buying these sheets because of some of the pictures with the stains and rips but thank the Lord above my sheets didn’t come like that. They are super soft even after you wash them. I love the color as well(I thought the emerald would be a tad darker but it works for me) I already placed my next order!!!!!
title: Awesome Soft sheets!!!

author: vmleiz
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2020
review_content: I purchased these because the weather is almost 100° right now and I had flannel sheets that were too warm.These sheets are cool and soft. They are deep pocket enough to fit the mattress and mattress pad. My big dogs sleep on the bed too and so far no issues with tears from their paws.I definitely think it's a great quality for the price.
title: Great quality, very soft!

author: Catherine
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2018
review_content: I was skeptical about the quality of $30 sheets from Amazon, but decided to buy a set based on the overwhelmingly positive volume of reviews and the knowledge that Amazon has great customer service if I was unhappy with this product. These sheets have a soft, brushed texture, and don't feel cold when you climb into bed on a chilly day, unlike other sets of sheets I normally use. They are very comfortable. We have washed them twice so far and have not noticed any pilling or other signs of deterioration. The only issue so far is that my fiancee and I both woke up a little sweaty when we used these sheets on warmer winter days.
title: Perfect cold weather sheets

author: Kristin Coomber
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2020
review_content: If I could give zero stars I would, I ended up sending  these back, they were stained when they arrived. Tried washing them anyways and just were a scratchy weird material and the stains did not come out
title: Arrived stained, weird material

author: Gina
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2019
review_content: I absolutely love these sheets !  The price is right and the color is beautiful . I purchased the baby blue in king size.  I have had  my first set for over a year and they held up wonderful , still very soft never wrinkles and retained their color.  I purposely waited long to order another set to see how they would hold up and I wasn’t disappointed at all !  You cannot go wrong with the sheets I absolutely love them !  They also give you a very good amount of choice of Beautiful colors colors which is unusual to find in sheets .  Will be purchasing some for my daughters bed also !  Please don’t ever stop making these sheets !  I will be telling my friends about the sheets  for sure !The only thing I would change is that the color is really not a baby blue it’s more like an aqua which is exactly  what I was looking for anyway, but they might want to change the name of the color on this one.  But please don’t take away ‘this color,  it’s a rare find and very pretty! Most colors on sheets these days are very dull and boring but not these!
title: Finally a set of sheets I like !!!

author: Lori Yunk Review
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2020
review_content: I love these sheets so much that when I discovered them I bought two more for myself immediately. And then a few months later unfortunately / excitedly, we went up to a king size bed and I had to buy three new sets of King. I was not going to compromise on these sheets. I needed them. And then the next month I did a charity drive adopting several clients often angel tree. Several of them were elderly and asked for bedding. You know where I went. I'm 20 plus in with purchases on these sheets because I love them so much.
title: I've bought 20 sets!

author: Donna
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2020
review_content: This was my first time ordering these sheets and I love them. The only issue I have is that it is hard to tell which way they go. I have the blue paisley ones for my california king mattress and invariably I end up putting them on the wrong way. I would love it if near the tag, the company would also indicate which is the long side and/or which is the short side. As we get older and making the bed becomes a bit more difficult, getting the sheet on and then having to remove it to turn it, can take it's tole or our energy. Otherwise, thank you so much for a great product at a very reasonable price.
title: Soft and comfy

author: Collin
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2020
review_content: I just got one of these sheet sets in black today. It's as advertised, but be warned when they say it fits 16" tall mattresses - they mean it'll stretch to the end of the mattress but not under. The pockets are really only made for 14" tall mattresses at most. Good thing I have sheet clips to hold it on. Anyways, they're thin and see through if you hold them up to the light, but they are soft and seem like they'll hold up OK. I'll update my rating if I have any issues.
title: As advertized, but a bit thin.

author: Reviewasaurus
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2016
review_content: I purchased a set of these 10 months ago, in the baby blue, Queen size.  They feel just as soft as the day we received them.  There's no wear, or fraying, or discoloration to speak of.  We don't eat in bed or anything, or use oil-based lotions, so I can't speak to the issues that some people mentioned of oil type stains.  We do have a cat who sleeps in the bed with us, and she has not been declawed.  No snagging or issues to report there either.We live in Texas, so we didn't want very thick sheets.  These are lightweight and thin without being cheap looking or thread bare.  They keep us cool in the summer, but also work during the winter with a blanket or two.We do rotate these with another set, so they've probably seen about five months of use out of the last ten, and have been run through the washer and dryer once per week during that time.  They have not shrunk in the slightest, and still fit the bed properly.  We are actually preparing to upgrade to a king sized bed, so I came right back here to purchase our king sized sheets of the same brand, since we were so happy with the last ones.I hope that this helps.
title: Still going strong

author: AcousticChick
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2017
review_content: These sheets are beautiful I got the gray ones and there is just the tiniest hint of blue in the gray which is what I wanted. They are as soft, or softer than the luxury sheets at a resort or cruise ship, but a touch thinner and that is perfect for Florida heat. I washed before use, and they came out without wrinkles and the stripes kept their shine. The pillow cases stay on! They don't slip around or get bungled up. I paid close to thirty and I feel like I got more than my moneys worth. I have paid the same price at stores that start with R and end in oss, and these Mellanni are of such a better quality, I will purchase more from this company. Also the shipping was the next day (instead of 2 days) and this was the day before hurricane Irma. If you are trying to decide, my advice is buy these sheets. They are lovely.
title: Luxury sheets  at a GREAT price. MMmmmmm.
verified: Size: QueenColor: Striped – Gray / SilverVerified Purchase

author: Saultczy Bleu
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2018
review_content: i just posted this on my FB page and thought I should be nice and post it here too:hi! your friendly amazon prime whore here to tell you about some sheets i bought on amazon. we have a king size bed so buying sheets for it can be super expensive. i kept looking for bargain sheets at places like big lots, ross, anna's linens, and still often paying a lot for them only be be hugely disappointed very quickly.6 months ago i bought 4 sets of this brand (which comes with a flat and a fitted sheet and 2 pillowcases) for what was $25 then and then i bought an extra set of pillowcases for each set which were another $14 for each set - so $34 total for sheets and 4 pillowcases. they were in a section called "amazon basics" where they also had lots of other bedding ad bathroom stuff. i mix and match the pillowcases for extra flair for my bed. :)i was skeptical. that is super crazy cheap for king size sheets.guys, these things have been FANTASTIC!!! they are suuuuuuuuuuper soft and there has not been a single blip of piling yet after being washed 7-8 times. also, at first i thought it was weird that the fitted sheet was fitted the entire way around instead of just at the pockets, but it turns out that it helps keep the sheet on all week. i normally have to reset a pocket a couple of times a week with other sheets because i thrash around so much at night. not once have i even had to do that with these. they are also what i consider to be a "normal" thickness for a sheet. some of the microfiber sheets i could actually see through them and then they ripped quickly.the only complaint i have is that on the ones with prints the print is only on one side. that just looks kinda cheap to me for some reason. but, hey, they ARE cheap.so if you want some new sheets and don't wanna take out a small loan to get them, try these out! there's tons of colors to choose from.no, i am NOT getting paid to do this. i simply found a great deal and i wanna help my friends out by telling them.
title: i can't believe how great these really are!

author: Anahi Garza
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2020
review_content: I like these sheets; they are soft, basically wrinkle free, they keep cool so you arent hot during your sleep.  They dont fade and are pretty stain resistant up until now at least.My two main critiques: the pockets arent that deep so i do find myself having to re-fit the bedsheet every morning more than with my other two sets of sheets AND these sheets have pilled while my other two sets (at least not yet) have not.  the other two sets i have are the amazon basics and they have deeper pockets  (that i dont really have to readjust - just maybe slightly in the AMs) and they have not yet pilled.
title: Soft, basically wrinkle free, but they pill

author: Becca
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2019
review_content: Love these sheets! I am super picky with sheets so I was hesitant based on the price but I am in love with these! I’ve had these sheets now for a couple of months and they’ve been through the wash multiple, multiple times—- typically sheets get pilly or show signs of use, but these still look brand new! I waited to write a review since I hate when people review based on just first impressions... but seriously these sheets are great. And for the price?! You can’t beat it!!!
title: Buy these sheets... seriously.

author: Jess B.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2019
review_content: I bought these sheets after I stayed at a friends house and she had the same ones on her guest bed but in a different color (which I’m also ordering.) For the price, these sheets are flipping amazing. I think I’m probably going to order a few more colors not just for our bed but my kids rooms as well. They are incredibly soft and durable. My husband even loves them and he’s a bedding snob. In fact, before he finally gave in to me buying them, we had purchased these Columbia cooling sheets that were over $150 and they were absolute garbage. I’ve never returned bedding before that. I’d spend thousands on multiple sets of these.
title: Softest sheets ever.
verified: Size: KingColor: Striped – Light BlueVerified Purchase

author: Rob
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2020
review_content: These are cheap sheets in the sense of price,  33 dollars for a queen set is a great price.  They are nice and soft, no issues there.  They have been through one wash and don't seem to have any ill effects.  The only thing I'm not crazy about is they are not cool sheets.  There is a noticeable difference between touching these sheets and touching the bamboo sheets that I have, the bamboo feel cold to the touch.  That matters in Florida and makes it a bit less comfortable to sleep.  However, the bamboo sheets are likely going back because they were 109 dollars and these are 33 dollars.  I can buy 3 sets of these for the price of one of the other and the bamboo sheets were called cheap looking by the wife and these she said are fine.  All in all these seem to be great sheets, just be aware  that if you are looking for something that feels cool, these are not going to do it.
title: So far a decent sheet for the price

author: Teresa Phillips
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2020
review_content: Received the set and felt very soft. Looked over them for defects before I washed them as I do not lay on sheets right out of the packaging.  Missed the large red stain on the pillowcase. I put some stain remover on the spot but will not come out. Called Amazon to see if I could return since I had washed them. Rep told me to keep them and they would refund my money. When I get my refund going to try another set.  If you get a set without stains well worth the money because they really are soft.  I will look closer for defects in next set.
title: Very soft but arrived with stain

author: Kindle Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2016
review_content: These came yesterday and I washed and put on my bed.  First of all they were terribly wrinkled when they came and they are terribly wrinkled after washing.  I do not have a big issue with that as they do smooth out on the bed, somewhat.  But they are so long, touch the floor long, and very narrow, at least 6 inches to narrow.  I also noted they are already beginning to pill after just one washing.  I slept last night first time on new sheets, and was very warm all night.  Live in gulf coast and it is still in high eighties here, but what will it be like in the hot summer.  I had a restless sleep.  Since they were so inexpensive I will keep them, but not happy, and look in the department stores for something like I had before I ordered these.  My previous sheets have lasted for over 8 years and they just finally wore out.  100% Egyptian cotton.  Hated to give them up.  But not happy with this Mellanni bed sheet.  Did I say my bed is a King?  Ordered the right size just not as advertised.  I also have been very happy with all my Amazon purchases.  But these are a fail.  Yes, they are soft, but not breathable.
title: Wrinkled and too small for my King.

author: Teenie Nickel
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2016
review_content: After my child ripped a giant hole in my former sheets while trying to climb up on my bed, I was in search of new ones. I came across these on Amazon Prime day as a lightning deal. I am very pleased with this purchase. I purchased the light gray sheets. I made a list of what I like about these sheets.*They fit very nicely over my mattress and pillow top, so they do indeed fit deep mattresses and have deep pockets.*They are extremely soft and silky.
