My husband was very impressed when he first slept on them. I love the feel too.*The color is a nice light gray that matches our bedding set.*I like that it also comes with two pillowcases.*Even after washing, they are still soft and look great.*I have had these sheets for two months, and I haven’t noticed any fading, ripped seams or other problems.Overall, these are good sheets, especially if you are on a budget. I am happy with them so far. I would definitely recommend these sheets. I will update if anything happens during the course of using these sheets that changes my opinion in any way.Thank you for reading my review and happy shopping!
title: Super soft sheets with deep pockets

author: Dagger One Bravo
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2018
review_content: I bought the full ones. They're nice and soft and the deep pockets are good. We have two pillow tops on our bed (one big one from Original Mattress Factory that's the same pillow top they put on their mattresses and another cheapy from JC Penney) and there's plenty of extra to still wrap around the bottom of the mattress.Problem is, it's too loose and the fitted sheet gets all wrinkled up under us at night which is exactly what I bought deep pocket sheets to avoid. Our other ones wouldn't go all the way around and at night they'd pull up on the corners, making the sheet loose and wrinkly. The only difference between these and the old ones is that these are deep enough to wrap all the way around. Still, there's just too much material so they don't actually solve the wrinkling problem.
title: Too Loose!

author: Narek Garibyan
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2020
review_content: I didn’t even get the chance to put these sheets on my mattress. It was soft, but seemed very thin and flimsy, not very expensive feeling (hence the price). It claims its “deep fitting pockets” to fit mattress up to 16”. I have a mattress topper so I always buy deep pocket, prior to ordering I measured my mattress WITH the topper to make it sure it would fit, mine is 12”, the sheets came and they were nowhere close to fitting. I don’t even think they would fit my mattress alone without the topper. I don’t understand the great reviews on this product, I guess it’s just the soft feel for the price. I’d rather pay more and get a quality product.
title: NOT deep pockets, seems cheap and flimsy

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2020
review_content: These are the softest bed sheets ever! We loved them so much that we upgraded every bed in the house with these. They hold a good deal of warmth - which I love, being cold-natured. The only inconvenience about them is that we have a relatively new dryer for clothes - and these sheets are so soft that they confuse the dryer sensors so that the dryer stops early before they're 100% dry. Weird, right? I have learned that the sheets must be dried in the dryer alone - with no other fabrics - in order to make sure the dryer finishes in one session. Otherwise LOVE them.
title: Obsessed with these bed sheets

author: PastorXn
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2020
review_content: We have now purchased three sets of these sheets. They are some of the softest my spouse and I have ever slept on. We have only owned for a few months so durability is not something I can really comment on just yet, but they do seem to be woven in a way that makes them feel stronger than most of the sheets I have purchased over the last few years. So unless the durability is not what I expect, I am going to continue to purchase these sheets for their softness factor alone!
title: Some of Softest Sheets Ever Owned

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2018
review_content: I’m so disappointed with the quality of this sheet set. I would return them for my money back if I had not already washed them. They are very thin. You Can see how thin they are in the pic. Soft yes, perfectly white yes but I’ve bought better sheets at Walmart for the same price. You want sheets to be thick enough you don’t see the design of your mattress and pillows through it. Not this sheet set. You can see the outline of the designs on both. Ugh! Waste of money.
title: If you love  soft but very thin sheets ..... these are the sheets for you.

author: Mary E Clark
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2020
review_content: Its been a month since I purchased these. I have changed them twice, plus a wash before using.  First of all, they are NOT wrinkle resistant.  The original wrinkles never "fell out".  In addition, the bottom sheet does not maintain its elasticity. The bed is always a mess and the sheet has to be tucked in every day. Never had this with other sheets.  The only positive thing about the sheets is they are soft.  I do not recommend these sheets.  I am very disappointed to say the least. I guess "you get what you pay for" :( The one star is for the softness.
title: Always a mess!

author: MommaMermaid
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2020
review_content: OMG!!! Yeeesss!!!! I’m doing a bedroom upgrade because quarantine haha. I was a little worried from the negative reviews but I know Amazon has always taken care of me so I bought them anyway. These sheets are PERFECT!!! Exactly the color I envisioned and oh sssooo soft!!! There were no stains or defects like in some of the reviews and trust me I looked!! These are sooo pretty and match perfectly! The price was so worth it! Now I just need a new comforter.
title: Take the chance!!!! Not disappointed!!

author: Ms. Dee
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2020
review_content: I washed these as soon as I got them. Immediately out of the dryer I put them on my cal king bed and just laid there. Let me tell you, these are soooo soft! I wouldn’t believe the tags saying that it’s microfiber. Overall first impression is amazing! I’ll update in a week or two to see how well they are holding up. So far so good! I don’t want to leave my bed LOL
title: Sooooo soft!

author: Michael J. Hanna
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2019
review_content: Garbage, had for only 2 months (October 5th) washed approximately 3 times swapped with another set of sheets we had every other setting now tonight after the wash had a hole/tear in the sheets. I would not recommend these sheets to anyone, spend twice the price at a local store on a sheet that will last 10 times as long! They did feel good for 2 months is the only thing I can say to bad they are of no quality.
title: Tear easy just from washing (2 months use).

author: SB
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2020
review_content: I was sucked in by the lure of soft sheets. What I got was 100% polyester sheets that do not breath and make you feel so hot when sleeping. I dread getting into bed knowing these sheets are waiting for me! Do your research on You Tube before you buy these sheets. I’ve learned 100% cotton long thread sheets are what I need and can get for $10 more than these.
title: Hot sheets that do not breathe mace from 100% polyester

author: William E. Waldron
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2019
review_content: I love the smooth soft touch, the coolness of the sheets and the orange & paisley blue colors.  As you can see in the picture the sheets do not fit my 14"  mattress - suppose to fit up a 16"  mattress. They probably will fit a 9 or 10"  mattress.  Bought two sets of orange and two sets of paisley blue.  Gave all 4 sets away to a friend who had a 9" twin xl mattress. Sorry Jessica I can not give you a good review.  Look at the picture!  Do you sell extra deep pockets sheets that will fit todays twin xl  adults are buying for split kings?
title: Update:  does not fit a 14" mattress, The description said they will fit up 16"

author: Carl
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2020
review_content: Silver Grey is Garbage.  Truly feel like I had money stolen from me. I have bought thousands of products on Amazon and this may be the worst. Stains and threading falling apart on the pillowcases. Shower before bed every night and woke up with stains all over the sheets from facial lotion that had dried hours before. Never had an issue with any other bedsheets. You are better off going to Walmart or the dollar store
title: Silver grey stay away
verified: Size: QueenColor: Striped – Gray / SilverVerified Purchase

author: Ann
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2019
review_content: I've only had it for about 2 weeks and it feels amazing. So far, I've only washed it once in a cold cycle and it came out fine and wrinkle-free. I'm not sure if the "wrinkle-free" claims mean that they will be relatively resistant to wrinkling even with use but these did not stay "wrinkle-free" after a couple nights, and they are fairly obvious especially since I got them in white.Another important thing to note is that these are definitely not as deep as it claims, it barely goes over my 10 in. high bed and I would actually prefer that it goes past a little more.
title: VERY soft! But not as deep

author: m7
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2016
review_content: My husband I have been sleeping on these sheets for a couple weeks and are pleased.  They are soft and comfortable.  As mentioned in previous reviews they wick moisture away and do not give you the feel of sleeping on damp sheets for those of you that may have hot flashes.  They are lighter and thinner than traditional high thread count sheets, but it is not a cheap low thread count type of thin.  This feel is inherent to the different type fabric and I do not see this as a negative as it is like comparing apples and oranges.  There is plenty of fabric with deep pockets as advertised.  If you prefer the heavy feel that a traditional high thread count cotton sheet provides or sheets that are so tight you could bounce a quarter off them these sheets are not the sheets for you.  If you the like soft sheets that easily provide a look of a high thread count sheet without the weight or wrinkles inherent to cotton fabric these sheets are for you.  We are pleased with the quality and feel the company delivered the features as advertised.  My only desire would be that the top sheet had the same type of decorative switching as the pillow cases, but I knew this was not a feature when I purchased them.  We would purchase these sheets again!
title: ... on these sheets for a couple weeks and are pleased. They are soft and comfortable

author: D. Jenne
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2017
review_content: I spent 2 hours reading product descriptions and reviews, trying to find the softest sheets possible. I chose well. These sheets are amazingly soft! Not too thin, not too thick, not heavy or flimsy, not hot or cold. But mostly, crazy soft! The pillowcase is the best of the lot. It may be exactly the same as the rest, but it is so much more noticeable when my face is pressed against my pillow at night.I might have liked a slightly larger topsheet, since I use pretty large blankets, but that's hardly the fault of the sheets.The fitted sheet works well with a 12" memory foam mattress. It might fit a slightly taller one, but I think 16" might be a bit much.
title: So soft! And just the right thickness, too.

author: eudaman
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2020
review_content: They do not fit a modern queen bed.  Way too small.  They might fit like a 5 inch thick queen.  Very disappointed as cant even use these on a 10 inch thick queen mattress.  Do not buy, as the fitted sheet is crap.
title: Fitted sheet WAYYY TOO SMALL!

author: SJ
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2019
review_content: I've needed a second set of sheets for our bed for a while, but I always put it off because I don't feel like spending $80 on sheets. These sheets caught my eye by their great reviews and I figured they were worth a try. I'm not disappointed in them, considering what I paid. They're soft, appropriately sized, and a cute pattern (I bought paisley). The fitted sheet is kind of cheap feeling with its elastic liner, but once on the bed, you could never tell. I would recommend these as a good set of "back-up" sheets or for a room rarely used. I prefer a little bit higher quality sheet for my regular, daily used bed.
title: Decent sheets

author: JMoon
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2019
review_content: I waited to leave this review and after 1 month on these sheets I am happy to say they are great. They are soft and yet feel very well made. They do wrinkle some, but it's minimal at best and easy to deal with. The color it beautiful, it went perfect with our new home. The sheets have been washed several times now and they are holding up beautifully. The color has not changed, bled, or faded at all. I recommend these sheets and will definitely buy again.
title: Soft, beautiful color and sturdy.

author: Kathryn Chapman
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2019
review_content: I love these sheets. My kid loves these sheets. My dog loves these sheets 😂. I ordered the purple and it is a beautiful color. I washed on cold, gentle cycle alone and dried with a soft, dry towel and a dryer sheet until just dry on low heat prior to use. There has not been any pilling after 3 washes like this so far. The sheets are thin, but I’m fine with that because I have a really fluffy quilted mattress cover underneath. They are VERY soft and are not overly hot. They also don’t wrinkle at all. The queen size fits my deep mattress perfectly and I will be ordering a second set. They’re a steal for the price. I’m not thrilled with the end of the pillow cases, but I bought bigger, fluffier pillows and the fit is better now. Also, these sheets will show lotion etc. If you are a person that uses lotion right before bed, just make sure you are dry first and you won’t have any issues. I learned this with my daughter’s eczema lotion, but the spots did wash out easily.
title: Perfect for us!

author: Elsbeth
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2020
review_content: I purchased the dark purple color which is true to image. I can't say much for stain resistance right now as I haven't had them very long yet.I have washed them and this did not cause any damage to the sheets, color loss, or bleeding onto other fabrics that were washed with it.They are very soft and do not get too hot or cold while sleeping on them. They feel way better than our $100 1000count cotton sheets we had before. My husband loves them and says it feels like we are sleeping on a nice hotel bed.
title: Better than our expensive sheets

author: Amazon Bro
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2017
review_content: These are comfortable sheets, moreso than cotton in my opinion. Some people have complained that they don't fit, but so far mine have had no such issues. They are very soft and are not itchy unlike cheap cotton sheets. They aren't quite silk, but for the money you are going to get a pretty good set of sheets that feel good on your skin.I also noticed that they came with a lifetime warranty, and although I can't see myself utilizing that guarantee I suppose it is nice to have. I would recommend these sheets to others. I gave them 4 stars out of 5 not because they have any defect but because they are just "good," and at this price that is good enough.
title: Pretty Good Sheets

author: Nichole
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2017
review_content: I waited awhile to write this review because while I knew right away that they felt and looked nice, I wanted to see what would happen after a few washings. I was sure they'd start to pill, or wear thin in places. I had a similar set of sheets that developed a hole where right where my feet tend to rub after a few weeks.But I've had these sheets for three months now and there is no sign of wear. I'm very satisfied with these sheets! They are so soft and feel/look really nice. My only complaint is that the bottom sheet is a little too big for my mattress, even with a rather thick mattress pad, so it tends to wrinkle and not pull as taut as I'd like. If you have a foam mattress topper or something like that then this might be perfect.
title: Durable!
verified: Size: QueenColor: Striped – Gray / SilverVerified Purchase

author: George W. Banks Jr.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2020
review_content: Very thin silk-like fabric, only slightly thicker than a sheet of newsprint. I ordered two sets but actually received three, apparently because they’re so thin it’s hard to tell how many you have. I also ordered two mattress covers at the same time, but only received one. I kept one set of sheets as compensation for the missing mattress cover and returned the two remaining sheets for credit. The sheets are in a guest bedroom so only get used a few times a year so they might suffice for that application.
title: Thinnest sheets I’ve ever seen
verified: Size: QueenColor: Striped – Light BlueVerified Purchase

author: Steve B
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2020
review_content: Extremely soft and comfortable, have been completely wrinkle-free and no stains. We didn’t think we’d do well with having white sheets but these have held up very well and just getting a second set more than two years later (we cycle in other sets though). Detail stitching on the pillows isn’t the nicest but overall these are still winners.Update: the new set is about to 1/4 of the quality of the first set. They’re now just thin, cheap sheets. Will not be buying any more.
title: Outstanding value (update: not anymore)

author: H Brady
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2019
review_content: I have washed and used these sheets several times now. Right out of the box they are silky and soft feeling, which has not changed with washes. They have not pilled and appear just as they did day one. They are also wrinkle-resistant which is appreciated as I can't always remove my items from the dryer right away.  I have always been a hot sleeper. I will wake up sweaty on a regular basis, while my husband has historically always been comfortable. I had read in some reviews that these sheets sleep silky and cool. We did not find this to be so. The very first time using them my husband woke up the next day and told me he kept waking up so he could roll to a cooler spot. I had to shower in the morning due to how hot and sweaty I was all night. We tried to give these sheets the benefit of the doubt, but now we have slept on them through a midwest polar vortex and I still work up in the middle of the night to throw off everything but the top sheet and all of my clothes. These were not worth the purchase price for me, but three stars for the positive aspects listed in the first paragraph.
title: Not for hot sleepers

author: Misty W Brown
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2019
review_content: I am truly shocked at the great reviews on these sheets. I purchased them after seeing an article on Facebook praising them. I 100% regret this purchase! They are not soft, at all. They feel like thin, cheap curtains.
title: Don’t waste your money.

author: Kelley
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2019
review_content: I happened across a review of these sheets on FB, and I thought I'd give them a try.  I've been loyal to a particular type of beech fiber modal sheets for YEARS, but the AC in my rental leaves something to be desired for cooling the upstairs and I wasn't sleeping well.  I purchased these after reading how wonderfully cool they feel, and it's so true!  They're soft, comfortable and I do love how nice and cool they keep me at night.  The price point can't be beat either.  Love them!Update 7/30/2019:  I just received my second set yesterday.  I ordered the grey paisley.  They're very pretty, but be forewarned that they are more beige than they are grey.
title: These sheets are great!

author: SG
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2019
review_content: I have purchased 6 sets of these sheets in king and queen sizes now. They are super soft, wear well (I’ve had them two years now), and just got another two sets for a guest room. I can’t recommend them more— they are the best value for what you get and way softer than even the highest thread count cotton. Breathe well. Also fit over my mattress which is a thick/high mattress.Highly recommend
title: Highly recommend. Soft and durable sheets

author: Acur81
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2020
review_content: These sheets are cheaply made, but serviceable, for the price. The flaps on the pillowcases are too short to cover the ends of the pillows. They are very soft, and they do fit my mattress as well as more expensive sheets. I haven't had them very long, and how they hold up, long term, will determine if I buy more. Times are tight, with Covid, and I couldn't really afford more expensive sheets, but needed to replace a very old set that was getting pretty ratty.
title: Good cheap sheets

author: Jason & Juan
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2020
review_content: I was curious of how well these sheets would work when I purchased them due to the price. We just bought a home and were spending a ton of money furnishing and putting together our new home. So every penny saved was good. Surprisingly these sheets are awesome. They are a soft, do not wrinkle, not to heavy for Texas nights, nor are they to thin. I have washed them half a dozen times and they are holding up. I ordered a second set for our master bed and plan on order a set for our guestroom soon. Great buy.
title: Pleased with my purchase.
verified: Size: California KingColor: Light GrayVerified Purchase

author: Cooper's mom
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2020
review_content: These are nice sheets and were purchased after a FB group I’m in continuously posted these as recommendation for bedding. They wash well and are soft. Not wrinkly either. My only issue is that they do not fit our pillow top mattress the best. Need to be a little bigger. We use the fitted sheet straps on the corners so they don’t come off. I would say for the price and quality of these sheets I would buy more and continue to use the sheet straps vs paying $80+ for compareable sheets that may fit the same. I also plan to buy some for my sons bed.
title: Great but 4 stars because their a tad small for pillow top mattress

author: Megan P.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2020
review_content: These worked for a few months until we noticed the fabric pilling.  I move quite a bit in my sleep and we noticed that the underside of the top sheet started pilling really badly where my feet are, probably from the friction of my feet moving.  It wasn't on my husband's side but he sleeps mostly still.  The pilling is now really uncomfortable and makes a loud scratchy noise when my feet rub up against that area (which is constantly) and my husband says it's so bad it wakes him up!  I've NEVER had this issue with a set of sheets before so it's clearly the material that these are made of.  They're inexpensive and quite soft.....if you lie completely still all night long.  If you're a mover like me, you'll regret buying them.
title: This fabric pills!
verified: Size: California KingColor: Spa MintVerified Purchase

author: Paige Pearce
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2019
review_content: Love these sheets!! I’m always looking for a deal for king sheets because they can be ridiculously expensive!! These sheets feel like they had an expensive price tag, they’re super soft and be already washed them a handful of times and they are holding up.  They don’t cover our pillow top mattress perfectly but I’m not waking up with half the sheet under me either, it’s more on the sides that it doesn’t seem to come down all the way but for the price I can handle that, no one but us sees that anyway.  Either way, if you’re looking affordable, comfy, durable, soft sheets, these are a great buy.  The color (dark grey) was exactly like the picture showed and just what we wanted!
title: Great affordable sheets!

author: Mandy Widom
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2019

author: JBaker
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2020
review_content: All I can say is wow! After reading a couple of negative reviews on here I was a bit nervous I was going to receive these and be disappointed but it had such good star ratings I decided to give them a try. I received them and immediately threw them in the wash. They came out wrinkle free and buttery soft! We have a very thick pillowtop mattress and the fit over then with ease. I cant comment for long term use because I've just gotten them but as for right now these may be the best sheet I've ever owned!
title: Buy them

author: J Schaeffer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2020
review_content: These are some pretty nice sheets for everyday use. They are soft and remain soft after several washings. I don't know if it is spots of fabric softener or from the lotion that I use but after 1 or 2 washings there are dark areas on the sheets that do not wash out. After about one year of use the corners on the fitted sheet stretch out and will not stay on. But for the price, I will buy new sheets every year. The colors are very pretty.

author: LidoGirl
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2019
review_content: I purchased these sheets because the reviews seemed overwhelmingly positive.  I ordered the pink sheets and about fell over when I opened the box and had hot pink staring back at me. The pink color they show seems more like a softer pink.  I thought, oh well, I'll work with it and they'll be covered by the blankets.  I immediately washed the sheet set and dried them.I’ve since washed and dried them twice and they’re great sheets. Very soft and comfortable. I’m only giving it four stars because the color was off, but other than that we really like them.
title: Washes up well & very soft

author: Tacocrusher
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2019
review_content: Considering how much I order on Amazon, I don't write enough reviews but these sheets have inspired me to start writing reviews again.One of my biggest pet peeves is fitted sheets that become untucked and require being tucked back under the mattress multiple times. I also wiggle a lot at night so this is a potential source of much frustration. These sheets don't do that. Yeah, they're brushed fiber and will take some time for my fancy self to get used to but the non movement of the fitted sheet is so, so good.
title: These will be my go-to sheets moving forward with lude.

author: D Green
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2020
review_content: After reading all the reviews, my wife and I decided to purchase a set for our new mattress. We were wonderfully surprised. Very soft and light. We also like how wide these sheets are and that we no longer have to pull on the sheets in bed for coverage. We've been using for over a week and will definitely be making another purchase.
title: Great sheets!!!

author: ZOMBIEFREAK88
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2019
review_content: I was a little skeptical taking these out of the package, I thought they would be a bit shinier, so I wasn't so sure how well I would like them.  I love that the elastic band goes all the way around the fitted sheet, keeps it in place and the comfort is what it is all about.  As soon as I lay in my bed I am immediately soothed by the softness and comfort of these sheets.  Keeps me cool or warm, whichever I need and helps me sleep through the night.  I highly recommend these to anyone looking to add more comfort to their mattress.  I would buy again without hesitation.
title: BEST SHEETS EVER

author: Jessica S.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2020
review_content: LOVE our new Mellanni bed sheets! They are soft yet silky, the perfect in between. I love them more than super soft jersey sheets or even the silky hotel/resort quality sheets. These are definitely the best! They also washed well and didn't really wrinkle from tumble dry. I did pull them out and make the bed while the sheets were still fresh so I expect that helps. No sheets are 100% wrinkle free but these are pretty darn close! Will definitely be buying more for other beds!

verified: Size: KingColor: Striped – Gray / SilverVerified Purchase

author: heather
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2019
review_content: The sheets are so soft and smooth. They are pretty thin. They fit our sleep number mattress well. Initially, after pulling them from the dryer and putting them on the bed, they were wrinkle free. After sleeping on them, not so much. They seem to work their way off my husband's corner of the bed (maybe because they're thin and slippery). The wrinkles font bother me and theyre not terrible. Good value. Will likely buy sets for the kids' as well. I like them.

author: K. McKay
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2017
review_content: I bought two sets of these back in March (Navy and Gray).  I like them quite a lot!  They are thinner than I expected though (which is nice in the warmer months, and honestly, a non-issue in the Bay Area winters).  The color is accurate, and I haven't had any issues with fading.  The sheets are nice and soft, and haven't pilled at all in the time that I've owned them.  I alternate the two colors every time I do laundry, and 9 months later I think some slight holes are starting to develop.  The price point is so low though, that it's not a huge issue.  I would definitely buy more.
title: Great sheets!  Would repurchase.

author: Sweet_T
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2017
review_content: So far, so good. I am very picky with my sheets but unfortunately my FAVORITE sheets were discontinued. I love a nice buttery soft sheet, and I was hesitant to purchase these due to them being microfiber, but they do not seem to have the typical heavy microfiber feel.  These are soft and airy, but not thin like I saw in some photos. Note that I purchased the grey. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because it advertised as deep pocket. I have a 12 in mattress and a 3 in topper and these just barely fit. I would expect a deep pocket to comfortably fit at least a 16 in mattress. I would definitely purchase these again, although I'm probably going to need some sheet bands.
title: Nice and soft

author: joyan
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2020
review_content: I bought this mainly because it had 100K reviews and I had to see what the fuss was about.  There was nothing special about them, truthfully it felt cheap.  I can't describe the feeling like smooth and slimy, I didn't like it so I returned it.  The beige color is also kind of dull.

author: Wandagail
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2017
review_content: My first comment regarding this order is the packaging.  These sheets were packaged very nicely.  I ordered the light gray which is a very pretty color. I just switched from a queen bed to a king, which means that I have a lot of replacing to do. I bought a high quality set of cotton sheets but needed an additional set and I wanted color to contrast with my duvet.  After reading the reviews, I decided to give these sheets a try and  I REALLY like them.  They are soft and comfortable and went through the laundry beautifully.  They have very deep pockets so fit well over my thick mattress. It will take a few washes to determine if they stay as nice as they are now.  If so, I will order another set in a different color.Good buy for the $$$.  I say go for it!!

author: Momof5.0
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2020
review_content: Very thin sheets! I want to contest the claimed “thread count” these sheets are so paper thin there is no way. The color is beautiful and they are able to fit my thick mattress. But I have bought similar sheets claiming high thread count at those vendors at the mall only to have them fall apart a month or so later. They were thin too. So my hopes for these lasting long are not high. In regards to stain resistant I haven’t had a chance to test, I have two little boys that are dirty and love to climb in bed with me so we’ll see.

author: Karsie
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2019
review_content: The bottom fitted sheet is generously cut, larger than my adjustable mattress needs, I have extra material to tuck under. The size would be great on the larger mattresses made today. The queen pillowcases are also on the generous side, easy to take on/off my queen poofy pillows. I love these sheets, they're the softest I've had in many years, washing and drying well, they feel so good and cool against your skin. I originally purchased the burgundy, a rich bold color. Two weeks later, I ordered the gold set! Both beautiful... The quality and softness make the set a sure winner!
title: Excellent sheet set!

author: Lyndsay D.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2020
review_content: I bought these sheets after seeing them featured on a TV show.  First impression, I thought they looked cheap.  This was before I even opened the package.  I make it a habit to wash all items that will touch my body before I use/wear them.  I pulled the sheets out of the package and immediately knew that I made the right choice.  These sheets are super soft!  I washed the sheet set and put them in the dryer.  They came out even softer and they did not bleed color in the washer.  I put them on my queen size pillow top mattress and they fit perfectly.  The corners stay in place when I toss and turn throughout the night.  My only complaint is that the stripes on the end of the pillow cases seem to be scrunched up after putting them in the dryer but its not a huge deal to me.  I will be purchasing sets for both of my children's beds.  The oil from my hair does not stain the pillow cases and the oil I moisturize my body with does not stain the sheets.  This has been an issue with other sheet sets I have purchased in the past.  I would definitely recommend purchasing this sheet set again.
title: I just LOVE these sheets!!!

author: D. A. Pannell
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2019
review_content: My first experience with the sheets was good and I really liked them, so I bought several sets as gifts.  Then I noticed a problem with static electricity during the night. No matter how I washed them or what type of softener I used, there is still a static charge.  My gifts were wasted due to this.  Since they were bought well in advance of the gift giving, there was no opportunity for returns.  Very disappointed.

author: Patricia Ann Elizabeth Hallissey

author: Sandra L. Fodelmesi
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2018
review_content: LOVE! LOVE! LOVE! I'm finding thread count is irrelevant when considering what I sleep on when it comes to microfiber. I have yet been able to wash the high-end thread count sheets enough to feel as soft and comfortable as microfiber sheets. review_content: I was very surprised by all the amazing reviews that these sheets had. Even when i was researching "best bed sheets" through google these kept popping up. author: Sarah Pitcock
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2020
review_content: This is the second set of these sheets that I have bought and I really like them. They are very soft and lightweight. They don’t make me hot but don’t feel cold when getting in the bed. My only complaint is that the newest set that I ordered doesn’t fit quite right. I placed The large hem on the flat sheet at the head of the bed. The sheet was VERY long but wouldn’t tuck in at all on the sides. I turned the sheet and it fits well but the true “top” of the sheet where the wide hem is, is now on the side of the bed.
title: Inconsistent quality

author: Stacey
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2020
review_content: Mellanni Bed Sheet - From all the positive reviews I was expecting more. The sheets are a bit thin for my taste. However, I have been sleeping rather hot lately, and since I’ve been using these sheets I am staying cool at night. They are soft but not as soft as I was hoping. They have very large pockets and elastic goes all the way around- not just in corners. I have the purple and the trim on pillow cases is very pretty, but there’s no trim on the the flat sheet. For the price I definitely should NOT be complaining!! Definitely glad I purchased.
title: Great sheets for the price!!

author: MisTre
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2018
review_content: I never thought I would be so excited about a set of sheets! (Proof I must be getting old) These are the type of sheets that you would steal from a luxury hotel and not even care what they would charge you for them - They have super deep corner pockets that are sure to not come off your mattress- The extra fabric on the pillow cases are a bonus! (not sure why I didn't see them as part of the description) it's perfect to make sure your pillow doesn't fall out of the pillow case, they are so super soft and unbelievably comfortable, with so many different colors to choose from, you would be nuts not to get a set (or 2!)
title: (Proof I must be getting old) These are the type of sheets that you would steal from a luxury hotel and not even care what they would charge you for them - They have super deep corner pockets that are sure to not come ...

author: Pat K
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2017
review_content: So I bought these only because I thought they 'looked' like some other sheets that I had purchased in the store.  These sheets are definitely lighter -- or should I say 'thinner' - than the ones I bought in the store.  Although they are nice on the very warm nights here in California.  The fitted sheets are deep, so deep that I had to pull them a bit so that it's a bit tight.  It would be perfect if I had a memory foam on top of my mattress.  The color I bought was 'blue' and vibrant, just like the picture.  Only removed one star because it would have been nice to know the thread count, but I should have realized it with the price.  Now the question is how long will this last.
title: Very thin sheets, great for the summer
verified: Size: California KingColor: Striped – Light BlueVerified Purchase

author: shawn harrington
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2019
review_content: I still like these sheets, but every set that I order seems different. We have a light blue set for a full size bed and they are SO SOFT and perfect! We got a beige set for a queen size that were not soft after we washed them a few times. Then, we got a king size set in light gray that seem not soft at all, right after opening. Also - the stain resistance - I'm not sure what's causing it, but they get large grease-like stains that do not wash away. This could just be where our dog sleeps? But she does not sleep directly on the sheets and she's not allowed on the bed unless she's "clean" (as clean as a dog could be). We just got the gray ones a week ago. It's odd and disappointing, but they are still good sheets for the price.
title: Inconsistent

author: Joe s
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2020
review_content: My wife disliked these sheets so much she got out of the bed and refused to return till I put the old sheets back on the bed.So if you want your Wife to leave you alone for the night buy these sheets. If you really dislike your wife buy a bunch cover everything and she will move out on her own.But if you love your wife keep the old sheets unless you have some funky moldy stuff on your old sheets then be healthy and use these.In a nut shell ill do me and you do you but i'm returning mine.
title: Wife refused to sleep on them
verified: Size: QueenColor: Pin Stripe GrayVerified Purchase

author: J
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2020
review_content: This is the second time I've purchased these sheets, both from Mellanni. The first set in 2018 were AMAZING: super soft, nice color, luxurious material, stain resistant, 5 stars across the board, and I was recommending them to everyone.However, my second set is pretty blah. The color is different and almost shiny and they're a completely different texture, nowhere near as soft. The second set looks and feels cheap. I was going to return them but accidentally dripped paint so I'm stuck with them.They honestly look and feel like two completely different sheet sets (despite identical packaging), and I had to double check that I'd ordered the same pair again. I'm torn about recommending these because of how different the two sheets are. I love my first pair but I'd be disappointed to receive the second. Good luck, it seems like it's hit or miss.
title: Hit or Miss

author: Joelle Foshee
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2021
review_content: This is my 3rd set of Mellanni sheets and I can't go back to anything else. The price and the softness can't be beat. I received the grey ones last year and both the green and purple this year. So far they are all holding up through washes and the color is staying strong too. I always thought people were crazy when they said they love crawling into bed and snuggling up in their sheets and now I understand why. I can't wait to crawl into bed and fall asleep in the silky warmth that is these sheets. I'm definitely going to get a few more sets to add to my collection.
title: Turns Your Bed Into Heaven

author: Brian Howell
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2015
review_content: My wife and I bought a set of these sheets in white at the end of March, 2015, and ordered a second white set three weeks later. We love them. They are soft and luxurious, and keep us comfortable whatever the weather. The fitted sheet easily fits our tall mattress and pillow-top. And any wrinkles smooth out after we put them on the bed.We've used one set more and it gets washed almost weekly. Neither set shows any recognizable wear or tear from having been washed multiple times.Two months prior to our first purchase, we spent over $250 for a set of "hotel quality," 400 thread count, long staple Egyptian cotton sheets and pillow cases. Within weeks they were pilling and had hardened, and we were feeling ripped off—especially after we bought these two sets of these sheets for about 1/3 their price!
title: Luxury at a Discount Price
